The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they held the Magic to just 16 points in the first quarter and held them to just 14 points the rest of the way . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as the Hawks outscored the Magic 34 - 16 in that 12 - minute stretch . The Magic were led by Nikola Vucevic , who recorded his second double - double of the season with 21 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 15 rebounds in 37 minutes . Victor Oladipo finished with 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and six assists in 35 minutes . Tobias Harris chipped in 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) and four rebounds , while Channing Frye added 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 3 - 8 3PT ) , three assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks in 24 minutes . Paul Millsap led the way for the Hawks , as he finished with a team - high of 20 points , to go along with four rebounds and three assists . Al Horford finished with 17 points and 13 rebounds in 31 minutes , while Jeff Teague added 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) , seven assists and two steals in 33 minutes . DeMarre Carroll was the only other Hawk to reach double figures , finishing with 15 points and eight rebounds . Atlanta shot 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot 45 percent ( 35 percent from deep . Up next , the Hawks will travel to New Orleans to take on the Pelicans on Friday . Orlando will look to get back on track on Friday , as they play host to the Hornets .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 22 - 21 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who finished with 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 30 minutes . He also added two assists , two steals and two blocks . Zaza Pachulia added 16 points and 14 rebounds of his own , while Brandon Knight chipped in 17 points and five assists in 32 minutes . It was a nice bounce back game for the Bucks , who had lost four of their last five games coming into Wednesday 's contest . The Knicks , on the other hand , have now lost three straight games , as they continue to struggle on offense . They shot just 41 percent from the field and 36 percent from beyond the arc . Tim Hardaway Jr. was the high - point man for the Knicks , finishing with 17 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting , while J.R. Smith added 15 points , seven rebounds and four assists in 37 minutes . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Willy Hernangomez , who scored 10 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) in 24 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Bucks will head home Friday to take on the road to play the Bulls , while the Knicks will travel to Boston on Friday to play against the Celtics .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 - 0 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 26 - 20 in the first quarter alone . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the game , as the Suns were n't able to keep up with them in the second half . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies , finishing with 24 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) , 11 assists and two steals in 29 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line a lot , converting on 10 - of - 11 attempts from the charity stripe . Marc Gasol also had a nice game , recording 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) , five rebounds , six assists and four steals in 35 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds . Courtney Lee was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He went 9 - for - 14 from the field to score 22 points , while also adding three rebounds and three assists in 39 minutes . The Suns were led by Eric Bledsoe , who finished with 23 points and five rebounds in 36 minutes . Markieff Morris was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , to go along with five rebounds and one blocked shot in 33 minutes . Brandon Knight came off the bench for 15 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , two assists and one steal in 26 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Suns will stay home and play the Mavericks on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 26 - 25 in the first quarter , but the Pistons battled back to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Raptors out - scored the Pistons 31 - 31 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Pistons were led by D.J . Augustin , who scored a game - high 35 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with eight assists and four rebounds . He 's now averaging 24 points and 8 assists on the season . Greg Monroe was the only other Piston to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 21 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 16 rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for Detroit was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who finished with 16 points ( 6 - 17FG , 1 - 93Pt ) , while also adding three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Andre Drummond finished with 14 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) and eight rebounds . DeMar DeRozan and Jonas Valanciunas led the Raptors in scoring with 25 points each , with the former adding six rebounds and four assists , and the latter adding 11 rebounds and three blocks . Amir Johnson added 17 points and two rebounds , while Greivis Vasquez chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Kyle Lowry struggled shooting , going 4 - of - 8 from the field , but still finished with 11 points , eight assists , four rebounds , three steals and two blocked shots . Cory Joseph Young was the high - point man for the Raptors , with 12 points , in 22 minutes off the bench , while Terrence Ross added six points ( 2 - 4 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) in 29 minutes . Toronto 's next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 34 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . The Bucks made a run in the second quarter , but were n't able to hold off the Pistons in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 22 - 18 in the final 12 minutes . Despite the loss , the Pistons were still able to out - rebound the Bucks 46 - 44 and out - assist them 24 - 21 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Marcus Morris led the way for the Pistons with 20 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists , in 41 minutes . Reggie Jackson added 22 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 9 - 10 FT ) and eight assists of his own , in 31 minutes . Andre Drummond finished with 15 points ( 7 - 17 FG ) and 17 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Tobias Harris chipped in 15 points , four rebounds and four assists , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished with 12 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Khris Middleton led the Bucks in scoring with 26 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , along with seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 40 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished with eight points ( 3 - 11 FG ) , 12 rebounds , seven assists and one steal , in 38 minutes , while Jabari Parker finished with 13 points ( 5 - 10 ) , five rebounds and three assists . Miles Plumlee finished with 10 points and six rebounds , while O.J . Mayo added nine points and two rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bucks was Mirza Teletovic , who finished with nine points ( 2 - 4 FG ) in 25 minutes off the bench . Milwaukee shot 49 percent from the field and 58 percent from three - point range , while the Pistons shot 42 percent from deep . Next up , the Bucks will head to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday , in what will be the second of a back - to - back for both teams . Detroit , on the other hand , will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Friday .

The Cavaliers were led by Kyrie Irving , who finished with 20 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , three assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 30 minutes . LeBron James followed up with 22 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 33 minutes . Kevin Love added 13 points and 13 rebounds , while Tristan Thompson chipped in eight points , five rebounds , two assists , three blocks and two steals , in 29 minutes . J.R. Smith struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 7 from three point range and scoring six points , along with two rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 28 minutes . Khris Middleton was the only other Cavalier to score in double figures , as he finished with nine points , in 11 minutes off the bench , while Channing Frye added eight points in 12 minutes . Despite the loss , the Bucks were still able to out - rebound and out - assist the Cavaliers , in 43 - 35 - 35 . Greg Monroe was the high - point man for Milwaukee , with 17 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3PT ) , in 26 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic added 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG ) , six rebounds , four assists and three steals . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 40 - 21 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers with 27 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and one block , in 46 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 24 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , 11 rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 43 minutes , while Timofey Mozgov chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 27 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 40 percent from the field and 21 percent from beyond the arc , while the Celtics shot just 39 percent and 13 percent , respectively . The Celtics were led by Kelly Olynyk’s 21 points and nine assists , in 37 minutes off the bench , while Marcus Smart added 21 points of his own , to go along with five rebounds , nine assists and five steals , in 36 minutes . Avery Bradley added 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and five rebounds in 40 minutes . Jae Crowder started in place of Isaiah Thomas ( ankle ) , who missed his second straight game , and finished with seven points ( 2 - 4 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 3 - 5 FG ) , three rebounds and one assist , in 17 minutes . Tyler Zeller ( eight points ) , Evan Turner ( two points ) and Brandon Bass ( four points ) were the only other Celtics players to score in double figures . The Cavs will play the second game of a back - to back on Friday , when they host the Knicks , while Boston will host the Raptors .

The only played 22 minutes , but finished with five points , two rebounds and one block , in 21 minutes . The Atlanta Hawks ( 28 - 20 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) 142 - 139 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 30 - 37 in the first quarter , but the Knicks battled back to make it a two - point game by halftime . The Knicks were able to make a run in the third quarter though , cutting the lead to three points , but Atlanta was able to hold on for the win in the fourth quarter . The key for the Hawks was their defense , as they held the Knicks to 40 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while also forcing them to commit 14 turnovers . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Hawks recording 36 assists to just 14 turnovers , while the Knicks committed 12 turnovers to just 32 assists . The Hornets were led by Paul Millsap , who scored a game - high 37 points ( 13 - 29 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 19 rebounds and seven assists , in 60 minutes . Dennis Schroder was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 23 points ( 9 - 25 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 7 FT ) and 15 assists , along with four rebounds and six steals , in 55 minutes . Kent Bazemore finished with 24 points and 10 rebounds , while Tim Hardaway Jr. chipped in 19 points ( 5 - 20 FG , 0 - 9 3PT ) , eight assists and five rebounds , in 58 minutes . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , with 19 points and 12 rebounds , and also had an assist and a block , in 38 minutes . Carmelo Anthony led the way for the Knicks , with 45 points ( 18 - 36 FG ) , six rebounds , four assists and one blocked shot , in 46 minutes . Brandon Jennings finished with 18 points , 11 assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 53 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis was the only other Knick to reach double figures in points , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) in 30 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for New York was Courtney Lee , who finished with 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 52 minutes . Justin Holiday was the high - point man off the bench , with 15 ( 5- 15 FG , 5 - 13 3PT . 0 - 13 FG ) and nine boards , in 36 minutes . Next up , the Knicks will head home to take on the Hornets on Friday , in what will be their second game in as many nights . Meanwhile , the Hawks will stay home and go up against the Pistons on Friday .

The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 33 - 22 in the first quarter and 39 - 32 in the second quarter . The Clippers were able to make a run in the third quarter , but the Warriors were able hold them off and eventually pull away with a 39 - point fourth quarter . Golden State shot 53 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range , while the Clippers shot 50 percent from beyond the arc and 40 percent from long range . Stephen Curry added 29 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 3 - 10 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 assists , while Klay Thompson chipped in 21 points ( 9 - 19 FG ) and seven rebounds , in 33 minutes . JaVale McGee finished with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) and eight rebounds , while Marreese Speights added 11 points and four assists , in 21 minutes off the bench . Blake Griffin led the way for the Clippers , with 31 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 11 - 13 FT ) of his own , to go along with eight boards , two assists , three steals and one block , in 30 minutes . Austin Rivers added 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 0 - 3 3PT . J.J.J Redick finished with 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) , three assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes . Jamal Crawford was the only other Clipper to score in double figures , as he finished with 21 points , four assists and two rebounds in 34 minutes , while Jamal Crawford added eight points , six rebounds and three assists . DeAndre Jordan was held to just nine points ( 2 - 2 FG , 5 - 8 FG ) but grabbed seven rebounds and blocked two shots , in 25 minutes . Next up , the Warriors will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back . The Clips will look to get back on track as they play host to the Lakers on Friday .

The Knicks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Lakers to just 11 points in the first half and outscored them 25 - 11 in the second half . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , two rebounds and one steal in 27 minutes , while Jordan Clarkson added 12 points ( 6 - 16 FG ) , three rebounds , two assists and three steals in 22 minutes . Julius Randle struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for - 7 from the field , but he did add seven points and eight rebounds in just 22 minutes of action . D’Angelo Russell started at point guard in place of the injured Nick Young , who sat this one out with an ankle injury . Russell played 22 minutes and finished with four points ( 1 - 7 FG ) and two assists in that time . Jordan Clarkson scored 15 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) in 26 minutes off the bench , while Lou Williams chipped in 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) to go along with five assists and five rebounds in 25 minutes . Carmelo Anthony led the way for the Knicks , as he finished with 26 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 2 - 4 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 12 rebounds in 38 minutes . Robin Lopez was the only other Knick to score in double figures , finishing with 16 points , eight rebounds and two blocked shots in 36 minutes . Jose Calderon finished with nine points and six assists in 35 minutes . Derrick Williams and Sasha Vujacic combined for just nine points ( 3 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , but Derrick Williams added eight points and nine rebounds in 32 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Lakers will stay home and play the Clippers on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 17 - 7 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 122 - 100 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 33 - 23 in the first quarter and 36 - 18 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Bucks were n't able to keep up with the Raptors ' high - powered offense . The Bucks were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who tallied 30 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds , five assists and three steals in 39 minutes . Jabari Parker followed up with 27 points of his own , going 11 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - of - 3 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also adding three rebounds , two assists and one steal in 35 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bucks was Malcolm Brogdon , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) in 16 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors , scoring a game - high of 30 points on 7 - for- 11 shooting from the floor and 15 - for 15 from the free throw line . He added three rebounds and three assists in 32 minutes . Kyle Lowry finished with 18 points , seven assists and four rebounds in 34 minutes . DeMarre Carroll and Jonas Valanciunas added 13 points each , while Terrence Ross chipped in 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) and five rebounds in 21 minutes as a reserve . Jonas Valancunas recorded a double - double of 11 points and 12 rebounds in 23 minutes , while Cory Joseph added seven assists , four rebounds and two steals in 27 minutes . For the Bucks , it was a forgettable night for the starting five , as John Henson , Matthew Dellavedova and Tony Snell combined for just nine points on 1 - for 8 shooting in 28 minutes . Up next , the Bucks will head home to take on the Wizards on Friday , while the Raptors will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday . The Raps will look to extend their winning streak to five games as they travel to Brooklyn on Friday to face the Nets .

Beal 's 24 points came on 10 - of - 19 shooting , while also adding one assist , one steal , one block and one three - pointer . This was the Nets ' second game in a row in Brooklyn and third game in their last four games .

Next up , the Lakers will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will go on the road to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 20 - 30 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 22 - 29 ) 108 - 104 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Mavericks were able to hold off the Trail Blazers in this one , as they outscored them 24 - 28 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Trail Blazers had a chance to tie or win this game at the buzzer , but C.J . McCollum missed a game - winning three - pointer as time expired , giving the Mavericks the win . Dallas was able to shoot 47 percent from the field and 55 percent from three - point range , while the Blazers shot 46 percent from beyond the arc and 30 percent from long range . This was a big win for the Mavericks , who have now won four of their last five games . Yogi Ferrell was the player of the game , as he tallied 32 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 9 - 11 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , five assists and two rebounds in 39 minutes . Wesley Matthews finished with 27 points and six rebounds in 40 minutes . Seth Curry finished with 19 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and three rebounds in 29 minutes , while Harrison Barnes chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal in 38 minutes . Dallas will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers . The Blazers were led by their backcourt of Evan Turner and Damian Lillard . Lillard finished with 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists , while Turner finished with 24 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and four rebounds in 32 minutes . Evan Turner was the only other than Lillard to score in double figures , as the other three players scored in double digits for the Blazers . The bench was led by Meyers Leonard Leonard , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) , eight rebounds and one assist in 37 minutes . Portland 's next game will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday , while Dallas will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) 107 - 102 in Game 4 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Raptors 31 - 26 in the first quarter , but the Raptors battled back to make it a two - point game by the end of the first half . The Raptors were able to make a run in the third quarter , cutting the Heat 's lead to five points , but they could n't hold off the Heat in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 20 - 20 in the final 12 minutes . Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade were the difference in the game , with Bosh scoring 21 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) and Wade scoring 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , seven assists and two blocked shots , in 38 minutes . Wade has been dominant in this series , as he 's averaging 24 points , 11 rebounds and 6 assists , in 31 minutes per game . Luol Deng and Shawne Williams chipped in 18 points each , while Tyler Johnson added 12 points off the bench , in 24 minutes . DeMar DeRozan led all scorers with 30 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 7 - 12 FT ) for the Raptors , along with three rebounds , four steals and one assist , in 41 minutes . Kyle Lowry finished with 22 points and three assists , while Jonas Valanciunas added 14 points and eight rebounds , in 29 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for Toronto was Terrence Ross , who finished with six points , in 17 minutes . Up next , the Heat will head home to take on the Wizards on Tuesday , while the Raptors will head to Orlando to play the Magic on Tuesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) 133 - 105 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 35 - 31 in the first quarter and 37 - 25 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to an easy win , as they shot 57 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pelicans to 48 percent shooting from the floor and 42 percent from long range . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers , as he finished with 20 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , 20 assists and five rebounds in 30 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line 20 times , converting on 11 of those attempts . DeAndre Jordan was the only other Clipper in double figures , finishing with 19 points ( 9 - 11 FG ) and nine rebounds in 23 minutes . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , scoring 22 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) and grabbing two assists in 26 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Tim Frazier , who finished with a team - high of 20 points and 11 assists in 35 minutes . Terrence Jones also had a nice game , scoring 18 points and grabbing five rebounds . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Buddy Hield , who scored 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) in 36 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head home Friday to take on the Warriors , while the Pelicans will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday . New Orleans will look to get back on track Friday against the Spurs .

The Rockets were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game . They outscored the Heat 26 - 14 in the final period to seal the win . James Harden led all scorers with 25 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and 10 assists , in 40 minutes . Dwight Howard added 26 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 6 - 11 FT ) and 10 rebounds , in 38 minutes , while Trevor Ariza chipped in 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Patrick Beverley added 15 points and four rebounds in 30 minutes . The Heat were led by Chris Bosh , who finished with 21 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , eight rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 29 minutes . Dwyane Wade added 19 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) of his own , along with three assists , two rebounds and one block , in 31 minutes . Shawne Williams finished with 14 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and five rebounds . Hassan Whiteside sat this one out with an ankle injury , while James Johnson came off the bench to add 12 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 28 minutes . Up next , the Rockets will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Orlando on Friday to play the Magic .

They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Thunder were n't able to make a run in the fourth quarter . The only other Kings player to score in double figures was Ty Lawson , who finished with nine points ( 4 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 17 minutes off the bench . The Utah Jazz ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 2 ) 99 - 71 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Jazz were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game , as they outscored the Sixers 25 - 18 in the final period to secure the victory . The 76ers were led by a pair of 10 - point efforts from Nerlens Noel and Jahlil Okafor , with the former adding 10 rebounds , two assists and one steal , and the latter posting six rebounds , an assist and a steal . Isaiah Canaan added 10 points , five rebounds and two assists of his own , while Hollis Thompson chipped in 10 points and four rebounds . The only other Philadelphia player to score in double digits was Dario Saric , who added 12 points in 21 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Derrick Favors led the way for the Jazz with a 20 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , three steals and two blocks . Rodney Hood was next with 17 points and one assist . Gordon Hayward was the only other starter in double figures with 12 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Trey Burke led the bench with 15 points and seven rebounds , while Trey Lyles was productive in 27 minutes as a reserve as well with 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 10 3Pt ) , six assists and three rebounds . Next up , the Jazz will head home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while the 76ers will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 102 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Friday . The Thunder ( 29 - 22 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left with a much needed win . In fact , Oklahoma City led by 20 after the first quarter and never relinquished the lead after that . The key for the Thunder was their defense , as they held the Grizzlies to 48 percent shooting from the field and 16 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Thunder recording 21 assists to just 20 turnovers , while the Grizzlies committed 21 turnovers to just 21 assists . The Grizzlies ( 30 - 20 ) have now lost four of their last five games , as this was easily their worst loss of the season . Marc Gasol carried the load , as he tallied 31 points , four rebounds , eight assists , two steals and one block . Mike Conley finished second on the team , accruing 18 points , one rebound , two assists and three steals . Zach Randolph was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Chandler Parsons was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . On deck for the Grizzlies is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday . For the Thunder , it was a big night on the offensive side of the ball . Russell Westbrook recorded yet another triple - double , accumulating 38 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists in the win . Enes Kanter was second among starters in scoring , dropping 16 points and eight rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Steven Adams recorded a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double of his own . The bench was huge for Oklahoma City , as all five of them scored at least nine points . Oklahoma City will look to build off this win on Sunday against the New Orleans Pelicans on the road .

Kristaps Porzingis led the Knicks in scoring , finishing with 27 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds and one assist , in 33 minutes . Derrick Rose finished with 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG ) , 11 assists and seven rebounds , in 38 minutes , while Joakim Noah chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 2 FT ) and nine rebounds , along with four assists and three steals , in 35 minutes . Dwyane Wade led the way for the Bulls , with 35 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 5 - 7 FT , 6 - 8 FT ) of his own , to go along with 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 32 minutes . Jimmy Butler finished with 26 points and five rebounds , while Rajon Rondo went just 2 - for 10 points , but did dish out five assists and record five rebounds . Nikola Mirotic added 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and six rebounds in 21 minutes off the bench , in his second game back from a knee injury . Next up , the Knicks will head home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Friday , in what will be the second game of a home - and - against - home set , while Chicago will stay at home and play the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday .
The New York Knicks ( 10 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 0 - 1 ) 122 - 97 on Monday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Knicks were able to pull away in the second quarter , out - scoring the Bucks 36 - 23 to take a 20 - point lead and never looking back after that . The Bucks made a run in the fourth quarter , but were unable to hold off the Knicks , as they were out - scored 32 - 24 in the final 12 minutes . Michael Carter-Williams was the high - point man for the Bucks , with 20 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 8 - 9 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes . Greg Monroe finished with 22 points and 14 rebounds , in 35 minutes , while Michael Beasley chipped in 18 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and five assists in 29 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double digits for Milwaukee was Khris Middleton , who finished with 11 points , two rebounds and two steals , in 33 minutes . Meanwhile , the Knicks were led by Kristaps Porzingis , who had 16 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 24 minutes . Carmelo Anthony struggled shooting , going 4 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for 5 from the three - point line to score 11 points . He also had six rebounds , five assists , one block and one steal , in 28 minutes . Lance Thomas Robinson Robinson was the only other than Anthony to reach double figures , as he finished with 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds in 23 minutes . Rookie of the Year candidate Carmelo A. Robinson had 24 points ( 8 - 17 3PT , 7 - 9 FG ) and seven rebounds , along with one assist and one blocked shot , in 21 minutes . The bench was led by Lance Thomas , who scored 16 points and grabbed four boards , in 25 minutes . Sasha Vujacic added 11 points and six boards , while Willy Hernangomez had 13 points and seven assists in 20 minutes . Up next , the Bucks will travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Wednesday , while the Knicks will stay at home and play the Nets on Wednesday .

The Raptors came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they took a 31 - 18 lead after the first quarter and never looked back after that , as they never relinquished the lead after that . Nikola Vucevic finished with 17 points , 11 rebounds and four assists , in 39 minutes . The only other Magic player to score in double figures was Jeff Green , who finished with 16 points , in 37 minutes off the bench . Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors , with 24 points , eight rebounds and six assists , while DeMar DeRozan finished with 13 points ( 4 - 19 FG , 0 - 2 3PT ) , 10 rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , in 40 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Magic will head to Miami to play the Heat on Friday .

The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 24 - 25 in the first quarter , but the Mavericks battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Rockets out - scored the Mavericks 27 - 16 in the final period to seal the win . Chandler Parsons followed up with 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 5 - 8 3PT ) , three rebounds and two assists , in 36 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3 Pt ) , five rebounds and one assist , in 31 minutes . The Mavericks shot just 43 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range , while the Rockets shot 41 percent ( 40 - 82 FG ) from the floor and a meager 40 percent ( 7 - 29 ) from beyond the arc . Next up for the Rockets is a matchup with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . For the Mavericks , they 'll look to get back on track as they play host to the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Miami Heat 109 - 106 at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 39 - 29 ) came into Wednesday 's contest as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Heat to just 53 percent shooting from the field and 41 percent from three - point range en route to a much - needed road win . Charlotte was led by Nicolas Batum 's 19 points , which he supplemented with seven assists and five rebounds . Kemba Walker was right behind him with 21 points , seven rebounds and seven assists of his own . Marco Belinelli led the bench with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a steal . Marvin Williams was next with 12 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Courtney Lee and Cody Zeller supplied matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding three rebounds and one assist , and the latter registering three rebounds , two steals and one block . Frank Kaminsky III was productive in a reserve role as well with six points and three rebounds . Luol Deng 's 22 points led the Heat , and he supplemented them with nine rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Goran Dragic supplied 16 points , eight assists , seven boards and a pair of steals . Joe Johnson and Wayne Ellington paced the second unit with 13 and 18 points , respectively , while James Johnson was productive as a reserve with 17 points and seven boards . Dwyane Wade registered 11 points , three rebounds three assists and two blocks . Hassan Whiteside ( 18 points ) and Tyler Johnson ( 17 points , four rebounds ) were productive as well .

The Sacramento Kings defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 94 - 91 , at Golden 1 Center on Wednesday . The Kings ( 6 - 4 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left with a much needed win . The key for Sacramento was their defense , as they held the Spurs to 43 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Kings recording 19 assists to nine turnovers , while the Spurs committed 14 turnovers to just 24 assists . The Spurs ( 5 - 3 ) had to play this game without Kawhi Leonard and Tony Parker and they simply did n't have enough in the tank to win . Manu Ginobili led the team in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , four rebounds and five assists off the bench . Danny Green was second on the team , totaling 16 points and two rebounds . Tim Duncan finished with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and five blocks . DeMarcus Cousins was the player of the game , accumulating 25 points and 10 rebounds . Rudy Gay and Darren Collison also scored 18 points a piece . The only other player to score in double figures for the Kings was Ben McLemore , who totaled eight points and four rebounds . Up next for Sacramento is a matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday . This marks the Spurs ' fourth loss in five games and they 'll look to get back on track against the Los Angeles Lakers on Saturday .

Dallas will look to get back on track on Friday when they host the Memphis Grizzlies .

The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 6 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 35 ) 119 - 113 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 31 - 18 in the first quarter , but the Magic battled back in the second quarter to make it a one - point game . However , the Warriors were able to out - score the Magic 35 - 36 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to hold on for the win . The Magic were led by Aaron Gordon , who finished with 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 16 rebounds in 36 minutes . Evan Fournier added 20 points of his own , shooting 6 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - of - 5 from the three - point line . Victor Oladipo finished with 19 points , nine rebounds and eight assists in 39 minutes , while Nikola Vucevic chipped in 20 points off the bench as well . Stephen Curry led the Warriors in scoring with 41 points ( 14 - 24 FG , 7 - 13 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and four steals , in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 27 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 5 - 11 3PT ) and six rebounds , while Draymond Green finished with one point ( 0 - 3 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) but grabbed nine rebounds , 10 assists , two steals and three blocks , in 35 minutes . Andre Iguodala was the only other than Curry to score in double figures , as he finished with 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3PT . Andrew Bogut played 23 minutes and finished with four points ( 2 - 2 FG ) , 10 rebounds , six assists , three steals and two blocked shots , in 23 minutes . The only other Warrior to reach double figures in points was Marreese Speights , who scored 11 points in 20 minutes . Next up for the Warriors is a road matchup against the Utah Jazz on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Magic will travel to San Antonio to take on Friday to play the Spurs .
The Detroit Pistons ( 26 - 23 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 12 - 37 ) 105 - 100 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 28 - 26 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Nets never led by more than seven points in the second half . Andre Drummond led the Pistons in scoring with 21 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 18 rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Reggie Jackson added 19 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , six assists and three rebounds , in 31 minutes . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 18 FG ) and five rebounds , while Ersan Ilyasova added 16 points and six rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pistons was Marcus Morris , who finished with 12 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) , in 32 minutes . The Nets were led by Brook Lopez , who scored 27 points ( 13 - 19 FG , 0 - 1 3Pst , 1 1 FT ) and had five rebounds and two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Lopez also had two assists , two blocks , one steal and one steal , in 35 minutes . Quincy Acy chipped - in 18 points and four rebounds off the bench , in 25 minutes . Thaddeus Young started at power forward and finished with eight points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Nets , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . Up next , the Pistons will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Nets will head to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Friday . The Hornets will look to end their losing streak at home against the Hornets , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 29 - 15 in the first quarter and 27 - 22 in the second quarter . The Nuggets were able to make a run in the third quarter , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Clippers , as they were out - scored 31 - 22 over the final 12 minutes . J.J. Redick led the Clippers in scoring , finishing with 25 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists in 32 minutes . Chris Paul finished with 23 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and nine assists , while DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with 14 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 8 - 14 FT ) and 22 rebounds in 34 minutes . Jamal Crawford was held out of this game with an illness , but is expected to make his return for the Clippers ' next game on Friday against the Oklahoma City Thunder . Kenneth Faried was the only Nugget to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) with 14 rebounds , three assists and one steal . Randy Foye chipped in 14 points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Up next , the Clippers will head home to take on the Utah Jazz on Friday , while the Nuggets will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 34 - 32 in the first quarter and 36 - 22 in the second quarter . Up next , the Nuggets will head home to take on the road to play the Timberwolves on Friday , while New York will stay home and go up against the Heat on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 22 - 27 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 21 - 28 ) 121 - 117 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 39 - 31 in the first quarter and 39 - 22 in the second quarter , but the Bucks battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Nuggets out - scored the Bucks 23 - 28 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Nikola Jokic led the way for the Nuggets with 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , 12 rebounds and 11 assists , while Wilson Chandler added 23 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 13 - 17 FT ) , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and four blocks , in 41 minutes . Kenneth Faried chipped in 19 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 7 - 12 FT ) and 11 rebounds , in 25 minutes , while Jusuf Nurkic added 18 points and three rebounds in 21 minutes off the bench . The Bucks were led by Jabari Parker and Giannis Antetokounmpo , who each finished with 27 points and 23 points , respectively . Parker added 11 rebounds and four assists , in 35 minutes . Giannis added eight rebounds and five assists . John Henson added 16 points and five rebounds , while Matthew Dellavedova had four points ( 2 - 5 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and 12 assists in 31 minutes , in his return to the starting lineup after missing the last two games with a knee injury . The only other player to score in double figures for the Bucks was Giannis , who finished with eight points ( 9 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) . Up next , the Bucks will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Nuggets will stay at home and play the Timberwolves on Friday . This marks the Nuggets ' fourth win in five games , as they continue to battle for the eight - seed in the west .

Wesley Matthews led the Mavericks in scoring , with 26 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 5 - 13 3PT ) , along with three rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Harrison Barnes followed up with 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and four rebounds , while Dorian Finney-Smith added 11 points and four steals , in 30 minutes . The Mavericks shot 41 percent from the field and 32 percent from beyond the arc , while the Rockets shot 50 percent ( 51 percent ) from the floor and 51 percent from behind the arc . Next up , the Rockets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in the second half of a back - to back set . Meanwhile , the Mavericks will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 93 - 91 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . The Timberwolves ( 11 - 24 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they left with a much better feeling about their chances of winning . In fact , they led by as many as 17 points in the first half , but the Sixers outscored them , 28 - 16 , in the second half to pull away . The key for Philly was their defense , as they held Minnesota to 40 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . They also forced the Timberwolves into 17 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own . The Sixers ( 9 - 23 ) have now won three of their last four games , as Joel Embiid continues to be the team 's best player . He led the team with 25 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal on 8 - of - 20 shooting . Ersan Ilyasova was second on the team , finishing with 19 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Robert Covington finished with 13 points , 10 rebounds , four steals and two assists . T.J. McConnell chipped in with six points , seven rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Zach LaVine led the way for the Timberwolves , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and one assist . Karl-Anthony Towns finished with 23 points , 16 rebounds and five assists . Gorgui Dieng and Nemanja Bjelica were the only other players in double figures , totaling 10 points and 10 points a piece . The only other player to score in double digits for Minnesota was Shabazz Muhammad , who dropped 10 points off the bench . Up next , the Sixers will stay home to take on the Nets on Sunday , while the Timberwolves will head home to play the Bulls on Saturday .

The Celtics have a couple days off before taking on the Pacers in Indiana on Saturday . This was the second game of a back - to - back for the Cavs , as the first of a four - game homestand .

Next up , the Warriors will look to continue their winning ways when they host the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Meanwhile , the Jazz will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday , where they 'll try and end their losing streak .

The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 39 - 22 in the first quarter and 39 - 20 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 52 percent from the field and 67 percent from three - point range , while holding the Heat to 39 percent shooting from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . He 's now pushed his season averages to 24 points and 7 assists per game . It was his second 20 - point game in a row , as he 's combined with Hassan Whiteside and James Johnson . Luol Deng added 14 points and 13 rebounds , in 31 minutes . Miami 's next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Blazers will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .

Tony Parker led the way for the Spurs with 23 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , six assists and three rebounds , in 31 minutes . Kawhi Leonard finished with 18 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) , eight rebounds , four steals and one block , in 28 minutes . Danny Green chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) , seven rebounds , one assist and three steals , in 29 minutes , while Manu Ginobili added 14 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3 Pt ) and eight rebounds . The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who finished with 22 points ( 8 - 23 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with two assists and one steal , in 39 minutes . Rajon Rondo struggled shooting the ball , as he went 3 - 10 from the field , but still finished with seven points ( 3 - 11 FG ) , 18 assists and eight boards , in 38 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Kings was Quincy Acy , with 15 points , in 23 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Pelicans on Friday , while the Kings will head to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Orlando Magic 103 - 101 at Staples Center on Friday . The Clippers ( 11 - 9 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they led for the final 30 - plus minutes . The key for Los Angeles was the rebounding , as the Clippers snatched down 45 boards to the Magic 's 51 . The assist - to turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 25 assists to just 14 turnovers , while the Magic committed 13 turnovers to just 22 assists . The Magic ( 10 - 8 ) had to play this game without Victor Oladipo and it clearly hurt them down the stretch . Elfrid Payton was the only starter in double figures , as he tallied 21 points , four rebounds , eight assists and four steals . Jeff Green led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 24 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Tobias Harris recorded a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while Nikola Vucevic totaled 10 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Magic is a road matchup against the Phoenix Suns on Sunday . For the Clippers , Jamal Crawford was the player of the game . Crawford accumulated 32 points , five assists and one rebound on 10 - of - 19 shooting . Blake Griffin finished second on the team , accruing 28 points , 13 rebounds and seven assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded 15 points and 14 rebounds . Jamal Crawford led the bench in scoring , dropping 21 points and seven rebounds . Los Angeles will look to build off this win on Sunday against the New Orleans Pelicans on the road .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 1 - 2 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 2 - 1 ) 120 - 108 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . Lillard finished with 40 points ( 14 - 27 FG , 8 - 13 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 10 assists and five rebounds in 42 minutes , while Aminu added 23 points ( 8 - 9 FG ) and 10 rebounds in 41 minutes . C.J . McCollum finished with 22 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Trail Blazers shot 47 percent from the field and 57 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were led by Draymond Green , who finished with 37 points ( 13 - 23 FG ) , nine rebounds and eight assists in 40 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 35 points of his own , while Shaun Livingston added five points and 10 assists in 25 minutes . Andrew Bogut played just 11 minutes and finished with six points ( 3 - 4 FG ) but did add eight rebounds and three blocks in that time . Ian Clark was the only other player to score more than 10 points for the Warriors , as he finished with 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) in 18 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Blazers will head home to take on the Grizzlies on Friday , while the Warriors will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

Miles chipped in nine points ( 3 - 5 FG ) , six rebounds and one assist , in 29 minutes . The Spurs came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Pacers to just 41 percent shooting from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Pacers 42 - 42 and out - assisted them 50 - 42 . The Pacers were led by Rodney Stuckey , who finished with 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , three rebounds and three assists in 35 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 18 points , 3 rebounds and 3 assists . C.J . Miles was the only other Pacer to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 7 3PT ) , two rebounds and two blocked shots in 32 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Pacers will travel to Toronto to play the Raptors on Friday .

The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 19 - 19 in the first quarter and 35 - 18 in the second quarter . The Magic were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were unable to hold off the Rockets in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 35 - 21 , which allowed the Rockets to pull away and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . James Harden and Patrick Beverley did most of the damage for the Rockets . Harden finished with 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and 10 assists , while Beverley finished with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , nine rebounds and three steals . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Eric Gordon led the way for the Magic with 18 points , seven assists and six rebounds . Serge Ibaka finished with 16 points ( 8 - 17 FG ) , 12 rebounds and one assist , while Elfrid Payton added 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and two assists . The only other Magic player to reach double figures in points was Jeff Green , who came off the bench and scored 19 points ( 4 - 7 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) to go along with two assists , one rebound and two three - pointers in 29 minutes . Orlando 's next game will be on the road against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Rockets will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 7 - 4 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 6 - 6 ) 110 - 93 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Clippers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 39 - 15 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Chris Paul , who finished with 26 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , 12 assists and two rebounds , in 33 minutes . Blake Griffin added 26 points of his own , along with seven rebounds , four assists and three steals , in 30 minutes . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with 12 points and 11 rebounds , while J.J. Redick chipped in 14 points and two assists , in 23 minutes . Chris Bosh led the Heat in scoring with 28 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 9 - 9 FT ) and seven rebounds . He shot 9 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for 2 from the three - point line , in 31 minutes . Mario Chalmers finished with 13 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) , three assists , three steals and one rebound , in 34 minutes , while Luol Deng added 13 points , five rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes . Hassan Whiteside was the only other Miami player to score in double figures , as he finished with 17 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , five assists , five boards and one steal , in 32 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 45 percent from the floor and 23 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - rebounded by the Clippers , who shot 56 percent , while the Heat finished at 45 percent . Next up for the Clippers is a matchup with the Orlando Magic on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . For the Heat , they 'll look to get back on track Friday , when they play host to the New Orleans Pelicans , in their next game .
The Boston Celtics ( 41 - 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 29 - 41 ) 107 - 96 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 34 - 17 in the first quarter and 35 - 16 in the second quarter . The Magic were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were unable to hold off the Celtics in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 35 - 18 in the final period . Isaiah Thomas led the way for the Celtics , scoring 28 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 12 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and five rebounds , in 34 minutes . Avery Bradley finished with 22 points and nine rebounds , while Evan Turner chipped in 16 points and four assists , in 32 minutes . Marcus Smart was huge off the bench , as he scored 22 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) , along with five rebounds and two steals , in 21 minutes . Amir Johnson finished with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 11 rebounds , as well as three blocked shots , in 33 minutes . Victor Oladipo led the Magic in scoring , with 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) , eight rebounds , five steals and one assist , in 39 minutes . Aaron Gordon finished with 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) and eight rebounds in 29 minutes . Evan Fournier was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , with 13 , while Dewayne Dedmon added eight points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) in 15 minutes . Next up , the Magic play the second game of a back - to - back against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , in which they will look to end their three - game losing streak . Boston , on the other hand , will be looking to extend their win streak to four games , when they host the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

Smith scored a game - high 28 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 37 minutes . The Knicks shot 54 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets shot just 39 percent and 38 percent , respectively , from the floor and beyond the arc . Carmelo Anthony was the high - point man for the Knicks , with 28 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting , along with nine rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 38 minutes , while J.J. Smith added 28 points of his own . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo , who finished with 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 7 3PT ) , four rebounds and three assists , in 32 minutes . Kenneth Faried added 16 points ( 7 - 9 FG ) , nine rebounds and two steals , in 31 minutes . Ty Lawson chipped in 17 points and nine assists , while Wilson Chandler added 11 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3PT , 0 - 9 FT ) and five rebounds , in 30 minutes . On deck for the Nuggets is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . For the Knicks is a home matchup with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back .
The Houston Rockets ( 11 - 3 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 4 - 11 ) 91 - 86 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 27 - 26 in the first quarter , but the Knicks battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Rockets were able to out - score the Knicks 22 - 17 in the final period to seal the win . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , scoring a game - high 36 points on 11 - 22 shooting from the field and 7 - 12 from the three - point line , to go along with six rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block , in 40 minutes . Donatas Motiejunas finished with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and eight rebounds , in 32 minutes . Trevor Ariza chipped in 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , five rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 42 minutes . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who finished with 14 points and seven rebounds , while Jose Calderon added nine points , five assists and one rebound , in 26 minutes . Iman Shumpert was the only other player to score in double figures for the Knicks , as he finished with seven points , six rebounds and five assists , in 30 minutes . On deck for New York is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday . For the Rockets on Friday , they 'll look to continue their winning ways , as they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 35 - 23 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 20 - 36 ) 107 - 96 on Monday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Spurs were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Kings 27 - 18 to finish the game . San Antonio has now won four of their last five games , while the Kings have lost three straight . Tony Parker led the way for the Spurs with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists , in 30 minutes . Kawhi Leonard added 17 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes , while Pau Gasol chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 5 3PT ) , two rebounds and one block , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Kings were led by Ben McLemore , who finished with 21 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 10 - 12 FT ) and four rebounds , in 35 minutes . Ray McCallum followed up with 20 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3 Pt ) and three assists , while Rudy Gay finished with 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and four steals , in 34 minutes . Jason Thompson finished with 12 points and 11 rebounds , along with two assists and one blocked shot , in 33 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for San Antonio . Sacramento will look to get back on track , as they play host the Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz ( 36 - 22 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 25 - 31 ) 109 - 95 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 36 - 27 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Gordon Hayward , who finished with 29 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , three rebounds and four assists in 34 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 26 points , 8 rebounds and 4 assists . Derrick Favors also had a big game , finishing with 19 points ( 9 - 14 FG ) , seven rebounds and two blocked shots in 26 minutes . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and 16 rebounds in 33 minutes , giving him his fourth double - digit rebound game of the season . George Hill chipped in 19 points of his own , shooting 4 - 6 from the field and 3 - 4 from the three - point line , while also adding four steals . The only other player to score in double figures for the Jazz was George Hill , who added 12 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and three assists in 16 minutes off the bench . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with a game - high 33 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 11 - 15 FT ) . He also added 12 rebounds , three assists , four steals and one blocked shot . Michael Beasley was the only other Bucks player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 22 points , six rebounds and six steals in 32 minutes . The Bucks shot just 43 percent from the floor and 39 percent from beyond the arc , but they were still out - rebounded by the Jazz 41 - 35 - to - 41 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . They 'll look to get out of this slide on Friday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder . Meanwhile , the Jazz 's next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Friday .

The only played 37 minutes , while Ersan Ilyasova was the only other Piston in double figures , with 16 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one block , in 34 minutes . Next up , the Magic will head home to take on the Spurs on Friday , while Memphis will travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Friday .

The Chicago Bulls ( 14 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 17 - 6 ) 115 - 106 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 35 - 28 in the first quarter , but the Blazers battled back to make it a one - point game by halftime . Derrick Rose and LaMarcus Aldridge tied the game up in the third quarter but the Bulls were able to out - score the Blazers 33 - 27 in the fourth quarter to seal the win . The Trail Blazers shot 49 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Bulls shot 50 percent and 33 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Bulls recording 18 assists to just seven turnovers , while Portland committed 20 turnovers to just 10 assists . The Blazers were led by Damian Lillard , who scored a game - high 35 points ( 13 - 21 FG , 7 - 11 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and six assists , in 38 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points and 6 assists on the season . LaMarcus Alderridge finished with 35 points and nine rebounds , in 39 minutes . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Wesley Matthews , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , four rebounds and one block , in 37 minutes . Despite the loss , the Bulls got 31 points and five assists from Derrick Rose , who shot 14 - for - 24 from the floor and 0 - 2 from beyond the arc . Taj Gibson finished with 12 points ( 2 - 10 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Pau Gasol added 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) , 10 rebounds and four assists in 33 minutes . Doug McDermott was huge off the bench for Chicago , as he scored 17 points and grabbed four assists , along with three rebounds and three steals , in 17 minutes . Nikola Mirotic chipped in 15 points , nine boards , one assist and one steal , in 19 minutes . Jimmy Butler finished with 11 points , eight rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 44 minutes , while Rajon Rondo added 11 points and eight boards , in 43 minutes . Next up for the Bulls is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , in what will be the second game of a four - game road trip , in which the Bulls will look to get back on track . The Timberwolves will also be in action Friday , as they travel to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks .

Rodney Hood finished with 10 points , three assists , two steals and one rebound , in 37 minutes . Rudy Gobert was the only other player to score in double figures for the Jazz , as he finished with a team - high 24 points , while going 9 - 16 from the field , including 3 - 3 from three - point guard . Next up , the Jazz will head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Friday , while the Heat will stay home and play the Trail Blazers on Friday . The Trail Blazers will also be in action Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 4 - 5 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 7 ) 101 - 99 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 26 - 25 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Lakers to 49 percent shooting from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 54 - 43 . The Lakers were led by D'Angelo Russell , who finished with 14 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 31 minutes . Roy Hibbert added 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and six rebounds in 29 minutes , while Julius Randle finished with 12 points , eight rebounds and four assists , in 28 minutes . Jordan Clarkson struggled shooting the ball , going 2 - for 7 from the floor and 0 - for - 2 from beyond the arc , finishing with four points , five assists and two rebounds , in 26 minutes . Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic , with 22 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) , along with three assists and one steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . Evan Fournier finished with 16 points , six assists and five rebounds , while Tobias Harris chipped in 11 points and 11 rebounds in 37 minutes . D.J . Augustin was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , as he finished with 18 points ( 9 - 16 ) , five rebounds and two assists . Elfrid Payton finished with two points , 10 rebounds and eight assists , but committed a game - high eight turnovers , while Victor Oladipo went just 1 - for 3 points , two rebounds and one assist , in seven minutes . Next up , the Magic play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Meanwhile , the Lakers play the third game of their current four - game road trip , as they travel to Miami to take on the Heat on Friday night .

Redick added 19 points , in 35 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with 11 points , 14 rebounds , three blocks and two assists , DeMarcus Cousins sat this one out with a sprained left ankle . The Clippers shot 48 percent from the floor , including 18 percent from long range , while the Rockets shot 44 percent , including 23 percent from behind the arc . Austin Rivers finished with 10 points and one assist , in 31 minutes . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 27 - 18 in the first quarter , but the Pelicans battled back to make it a one - point game by the end of the third quarter . The Pelicans were able to make a run in the fourth quarter though , as they out - scored the Spurs 23 - 22 , but it was not enough to get the win . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs , as he finished with 31 points ( 11 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , seven rebounds , six assists and three steals in 40 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge finished with 21 points ( 10 - 19 FG ) , 14 rebounds and three blocked shots , while Pau Gasol chipped in 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 9 3PT ) and two assists in 29 minutes off the bench . On deck for San Antonio is a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday . For the Pelicans , it was a night to forget . They lost Anthony Davis , Jrue Holiday and DeMarcus Cousins all for the first time all season . Davis finished with 29 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 14 - 16 FT ) and eight rebounds in 42 minutes , while Cousins had 19 points , 24 rebounds and four assists in 43 minutes . Cousins also had six turnovers , so it was n't all good for the big man . Holiday finished with 26 points ( 12 - 27 FG , 2 - 6 3P3Pt ) and seven rebounds . The only other Pelican to score in double figures for the Pelicans was Terrence Jones , who finished with six points ( 2 - 8 FG ) and five assists in 37 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will look to get back on track against the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Spurs will go on the road and play the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday .

Augustin chipped in 10 points and six rebounds in 30 minutes off the bench as well . Jordan Clarkson was the high - point man for the Lakers , with 19 points ( 5- 13 FG ) , in 21 minutes off the bench , while Julius Randle added nine points ( 4 - 7 FG ) in 16 minutes . The Pistons were led by Josh Smith , who finished with 18 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block , in 32 minutes . Andre Drummond finished with eight points , 13 rebounds and three blocked shots , in 25 minutes . Brandon Jennings finished with 10 points , four assists and two rebounds , while Ish Smith added three steals , two rebounds and one blocked shot , in 24 minutes . Jon Leuer was the only other Piston to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 11 points in 29 minutes . Next up , the Pistons play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , in what will be the third game of their current four - game road trip , in which they 'll look to end a three - game losing streak . Meanwhile , the Lakers will look to extend their win streak to four , as they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The Utah Jazz ( 24 - 35 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 42 - 17 ) 93 - 82 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range , while the Grizzlies finished at 40 percent from beyond the arc and 27 percent from long range . The Grizzlies were also out - rebounded by the Jazz 55 - 37 , which may have been the difference in the game , as the Jazz were able to force the Grizzlies into 15 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . Gordon Hayward led the Jazz in scoring with 21 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 35 minutes . Derrick Favors added 21 points of his own , while Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double , with 15 points and 24 rebounds , in 36 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Jazz was Trey Burke , who finished with 13 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and one assist , in 14 minutes off the bench . For the Grizzlies , Courtney Lee led the way , with 18 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) , five rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 38 minutes . Marc Gasol finished with 17 points , eight rebounds and three assists , in 34 minutes . Mike Conley chipped in 11 points , four assists , one rebound , one steal and one block , while Zach Randolph added 13 points in 23 minutes . Up next for the Grizzlies is a matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , in which they 'll hope to get their first win of the season . Utah 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Memphis ' next game is on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 36 - 9 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 28 - 17 ) 108 - 106 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Spurs came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they held the Raptors to just 25 points in the first half and never relinquished the lead after that . The key for San Antonio was their defense , as they held Toronto to just 45 percent shooting from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . They also forced the Raptors into 13 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs , as he tallied 21 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 9 - 11 FT ) and seven rebounds in 32 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points and 8 rebounds on the season . David Lee was the only other Spur in double figures , finishing with 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and two assists in 21 minutes . Manu Ginobili came off the bench to provide 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , three assists and three steals in 30 minutes . Kyle Lowry led the Raptors in scoring , dropping 30 points ( 9 - 23 FG , 11 - 12 FT ) to go with three rebounds , two assists and one block in 42 minutes . It was his second 30 - point game in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 6 assists per game . Norman Powell was the other starter in the starting lineup and finished with 16 points , four rebounds , three steals and one blocked shot in 39 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded his second double - double of the season , totaling nine points and 13 rebounds in 29 minutes . DeMarre Carroll and Jared Sullinger combined to go 0 - for - 6 from the floor and score just two points in 15 minutes . Cory Joseph led the bench with 21 points and two blocked shots , while Terrence Ross finished with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) , five rebounds and one assist in 20 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , while the Spurs will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

Up next , the Thunder will head home Friday to take on the 76ers , while the Hawks will head to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday . The Hornets will look to extend their win streak to three games as they play host to the Grizzlies .
