The Boston Celtics ( 35 - 19 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 34 - 21 ) 112 - 104 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Celtics were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Jazz 35 - 21 to finish the game and secure the victory in front of their home crowd . Isaiah Thomas led the way for the Celtics with 29 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , five assists and two rebounds , in 35 minutes . Al Horford finished with 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) , nine rebounds and three assists , in 34 minutes . Jae Crowder added 19 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench , while Kelly Olynyk chipped in 16 points in 23 minutes . Gordon Hayward led the Jazz in scoring with 31 points ( 10 - 19 FG ) , along with four assists and one rebound , in 38 minutes , while George Hill added 22 points , four assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Rudy Gobert finished with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and 13 rebounds , while Derrick Favors had six points and six rebounds in 26 minutes . The Jazz shot 41 percent from the field and 26 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - rebounded by the Celtics 37 - 37 . Next up , the Jazz play the second game of a back - to - back when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , in what will be the third game of their current five - game road trip . Meanwhile , the Celtics go on the road to Denver to take on the Nuggets on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 41 - 8 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 18 - 30 ) 110 - 97 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 30 - 18 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 36 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 12 - 12 FT ) , six rebounds , three blocks , one assist , one steal and one three - pointer , in 34 minutes . Kawhi Leonard followed up with 26 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds , in 36 minutes . Danny Green chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) and seven rebounds , while David West added 14 points , five assists , five rebounds and two blocks , in 27 minutes . Tony Parker struggled shooting , going 1 - for - 2 from the field , but finished with two points and eight assists , in 30 minutes . The Pelicans were led in scoring by Anthony Davis , who had 28 points ( 10 rebounds , four assists , four steals and four blocked shots , in 37 minutes , while Jrue Holiday added 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 4 3 Pt ) , four rebounds five assists and two steals , in 29 minutes off the bench . Norris Cole finished with 14 points and nine assists , along with four rebounds and one steal , in 33 minutes . Omer Asik was the only other Pelican to score in double figures , as he finished with six points and 11 rebounds in 20 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will travel to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans will head home to play the Mavericks on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 12 - 7 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 16 - 3 ) 132 - 127 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 32 - 30 in the first quarter and 32 - 23 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Warriors never led by more than seven points in the fourth quarter . James Harden led the Rockets in scoring with 29 points ( 8 - 23 FG , 2 - 11 3Pt , 11 - 14 FT ) , to go along with 15 rebounds and 13 assists , in 46 minutes . Ryan Anderson added 29 points of his own , as he shot 9 - 17 from the field and 5 - 10 from the three - point line , in 45 minutes . Eric Gordon chipped in 23 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 4 - 9 3PT , 1 - 1 FT ) and five assists in 39 minutes off the bench . Trevor Ariza finished with 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 7 3PT ) , four rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 43 minutes . Kevin Durant led the way for the Warriors , with 39 points and 14 rebounds , in 49 minutes . Draymond Green finished with 20 points and 15 rebounds , along with nine assists , two steals and one block , in 47 minutes . Stephen Curry finished with 28 points , five assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 38 minutes . Klay Thompson finished with 15 points ( 4 - 20 FG , 3 - 13 3PT . The Warriors shot just 41 percent from the floor and 27 percent from beyond the arc , as they could n't keep up with the Rockets . Up next , the Rockets will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Warriors will stay home and play the Pelicans on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 25 - 34 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 13 - 46 ) 94 - 74 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 27 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back . They were able to hold the Sixers to just 35 percent shooting from the field and 21 percent from three - point range , while the Pacers shot 41 percent from the floor and 17 percent from beyond the arc . Roy Hibbert led the way for the Pacers , finishing with 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 15 rebounds in 31 minutes . George Hill added 17 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , nine rebounds and four assists in 32 minutes . Rodney Stuckey chipped in 15 points and six rebounds in 19 minutes off the bench , while C.J . Miles added 12 points , five rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . The 76ers were led by Nerlens Noel , who finished with 10 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) of his own , along with 12 rebounds , three blocks and one assist in 35 minutes . Robert Covington was the only other starter to score in double figures for Philadelphia , as he finished with 12 points in 24 minutes . Jason Richardson added 10 points and three rebounds in 26 minutes , while Dario Saric added 11 points , four rebounds , five assists and four steals in 25 minutes . The Sixers shot a poor 5 - for 13 - of - 31 from three ( 35 percent ) from three point range . Up next , the Pacers will head home to take on the road to play the Nets on Friday , while Philadelphia will stay home and play the Knicks on Friday . This marks the Sixers ' fourth loss in five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . They 'll look to get back on track Friday against the Knicks .

Channing Frye added 10 points ( 3 - 4 FG , 4 - 8 FT ) and 16 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 31 minutes off the bench . Kevin Durant led the Thunder in scoring with 32 points ( 12 - 23 FG , 1 - 5 3PT , 7 - 9 FT ) with nine assists , six rebounds , two blocked shots and two blocks , in 40 minutes . The Thunder shot 39 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc , as they were out - rebounded 48 - 42 . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Thunder will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 32 - 33 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 27 - 38 ) 102 - 95 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 23 - 19 in the first quarter , but the Timberwolves battled back in the second quarter to make it a one - point game heading into halftime . However , the Bucks were able to out - score the Timberwolves 26 - 20 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to pull away in the fourth quarter and secure the victory . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who recorded a game - high of 35 points ( 14 - 21 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 14 rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 40 minutes . Ricky Rubio followed up with 22 points ( 9 - 14 FG ) and eight assists , while Andrew Wiggins chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 13 FG ) , four rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 37 minutes . Tony Snell added 19 points and six rebounds , in 28 minutes , while Matthew Dellavedova added 16 points and two assists , in 27 minutes . Khris Middleton finished with 11 points , nine rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for Milwaukee was Greg Monroe , who finished with 12 points , six boards , two assists and two steals , in 32 minutes off the bench . Next up for Milwaukee is a matchup with the Chicago Bulls on Friday , in which the Bucks will look to keep their playoff hopes alive . Meanwhile , the Timberwolves will head to Chicago to take on the Bulls , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back .

The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 34 - 27 in the first quarter , but the Raptors battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Nets were able to out - score the Raptors 37 - 30 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Next up , the Raptors play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Nets host the New York Knicks on Friday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 4 - 10 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 8 - 4 ) 121 - 116 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 34 - 23 in the first quarter , but the Hornets battled back to make it a one - point game by the end of the third quarter . The Hornets were able to make a run in the fourth quarter though , as they out - scored the Pelicans 39 - 34 , but it was n't enough to get the win . The key for the Pelicans was their defense , as the Hornets were held to 41 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Pelicans shot 44 percent from the floor and 39 percent from beyond the arc . Anthony Davis was the player of the game , as he tallied 38 points ( 15 - 27 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , 16 rebounds and three blocked shots in 42 minutes . It was his third straight game with at least 30 points and 20 rebounds . Jrue Holiday was huge off the bench , as well , as his 23 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 6 6 - 11 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and seven rebounds in 31 minutes were a season - high . Tim Frazier was the only other Pelican to reach double figures in points , finishing with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , five rebounds and eight assists in 36 minutes . The bench was huge for New Orleans , as both Ryan Anderson and E'Twaun Moore combined for 40 points ( 9 - 17 FG ) and nine assists in 30 minutes . Kemba Walker led the Hornets with 25 points ( 10 - 25 FG ) , seven rebounds and five assists in 37 minutes . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist finished with a double - double , totaling 10 points and 13 rebounds in 35 minutes . Frank Kaminsky III was a big reason the Hornets hung around in this game . He scored a team - high of 22 points and grabbed 10 rebounds in 33 minutes , while also recording four assists and four steals . The only other Hornets player to score in double figures was Nicolas Batum , who finished with 13 points ( 3 - 10 FG ) . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Hornets , as it was their first loss of the season . The win also snapped a two - game win streak for Charlotte . The next game will be on the road against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , while New Orleans will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 38 - 8 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 18 - 27 ) 113 - 102 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they took a 30 - 27 lead after the first quarter and never looked back after that , as they never relinquished the lead after that . The Nets were held to 45 percent shooting from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Hawks shot 46 percent from the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . Paul Millsap was the player of the game , as he led the Hawks with 28 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 15 - 16 FT ) , 15 rebounds and two blocked shots in 35 minutes . He also had a team - high of 15 rebounds , giving him his second double - double of the season . Al Horford finished with 20 points ( 10 - 13 FG ) , 10 rebounds and five assists in 33 minutes . Jeff Teague recorded a triple - double with 13 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , 11 assists and one rebound in 30 minutes . Kyle Korver chipped in 17 points and three assists in 36 minutes , while DeMarre Carroll had 12 points ( 3 - 6 FG ) and three rebounds in 29 minutes . Joe Johnson led the Nets in scoring with 26 points , while also adding two rebounds and one steal in 37 minutes . Jarrett Jack was the only other starter in double figures with 14 points and 13 assists , while Mason Plumlee added 14 points , seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and three blocks in 31 minutes . Alan Anderson finished with 15 points , six assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , while Jarrett Jack added five rebounds , 13 assists and two steals in 38 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Nets was Trevor Booker , who finished with 18 points and seven rebounds off the bench . Up next , the Nets will look to get back on track when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , and the Hawks will head home to take on the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 10 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 0 - 1 ) 106 - 99 in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Air Canada Centre to take a 1 - 1 series lead in the series . The Raptors were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . Toronto dominated from start to finish , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half and held the Pacers to just 37 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle 50 - 40 and out - rebounding them 50 to 40 . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring , as he dropped 25 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 16 FT ) , along with six assists , five rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes . Kyle Lowry followed up with 23 points , six assists and three rebounds , in 39 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded his first double - double of the playoffs , with 21 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 15 rebounds , while DeMarre Carroll chipped in 14 points , eight rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocked shots , in 41 minutes . The Pacers were led by Paul George , who finished with 17 points ( 4 - 18 FG , 0 - 4 3Pts , 9 - 10 FT ) with 12 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and one block , in 37 minutes . George Hill finished with 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) , three rebounds and three assists , in 38 minutes . C.J.J . Miles added 18 points , one rebound , one assist and three steals , while Ian Mahinmi finished with 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and eight rebounds . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pacers was Rodney Stuckey , who chipped 16 points in 24 minutes off the bench , while the only other Pacer to reach double figures was Al Jefferson , who scored eight points ( 2 - 7 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) in 23 minutes . Up next , the Raptors will look to extend their winning streak to three games , while Indiana will try and end their losing streak . Game 2 will take place in Toronto on Tuesday .

The Knicks came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 27 - 26 in the first quarter and 35 - 20 in the second quarter , but the Hawks were able to hold them off late in the fourth quarter . He 's now averaging 24 points and 8 assists on the season . Derrick Rose finished with 18 points , nine assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes , while Mindaugas Kuzminskas added 14 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and five rebounds , in 38 minutes . Joakim Noah recorded a double - double with seven points ( 2 - 3 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 17 rebounds , along with three assists , two blocked shots , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis sat this one out with an ankle injury , while he continues to work his way back into the rotation . The only played 16 minutes and finished with six points and eight rebounds , while starting in place of the injured Lance Thomas , who was able to play 23 minutes off the bench . Next up for the Knicks is a matchup with the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , in which they 'll look to bounce back from this loss . Meanwhile , the Hawks will look to extend their winning streak to four games when they take on the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 19 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 13 - 27 ) 101 - 99 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 24 - 24 in the first quarter , but the Pelicans battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Grizzlies out - scored the Pelicans 29 - 23 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 21 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 9 - 11 FT ) , eight rebounds , three steals and three blocks in 37 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , combining for 49 points , 15 rebounds and 10 assists over that span . Jrue Holiday came off the bench to score 23 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and grab nine assists in 29 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 19 assists over those two games . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was E'Twaun Moore , who chipped in 14 points and four rebounds in 27 minutes . Marc Gasol led the way for the Grizzlies with 16 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block in 39 minutes . Mike Conley finished with 15 points and a team - high 10 assists , while Zach Randolph finished with eight points and eight rebounds in 24 minutes . Zach Randolph was held to just eight points on 3 - of 9 shots , but he did add eight rebounds and two steals as well . Courtney Lee was the only other Memphis player to score in double figures . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for 4 - for- 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 33 minutes , while also adding four rebounds and one assist . The bench was led by Zach Randolph , who had 16 points ( 5 - 12 ) , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one blocked shot in 27 minuets . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Pelicans , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . They 'll look to bounce back on Friday when they take on the road against the Oklahoma City Thunder . The win snapped a two - game losing streak , while the Grizzlies will look to extend their win streak to five games when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 38 - 13 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 21 - 27 ) 117 - 114 on Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 32 - 32 in the first quarter and 33 - 29 in the second quarter , but the Magic battled back to make it a one - point game by halftime . However , the Thunder were able to out - score the Magic 30 - 20 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to hold on for the win . The Magic were led by Victor Oladipo , who scored a game - high 37 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and four assists , in 41 minutes . He 's now averaging 24 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Nikola Vucevic was the only other Magic player to score in double figures , as he finished with 16 points ( 8 - 16 FG ) and three rebounds , in 36 minutes . Tobias Harris chipped in 15 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) and seven rebounds , while Evan Fournier added 16 points off the bench , in 20 minutes . Victor Hernangomez had 13 points ( 6 - 7 FG ) , three rebounds and two blocked shots , in 18 minutes . Kevin Durant led the way for the Thunder , with 37 points , five rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals , in 37 minutes . Russell Westbrook finished with 24 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 19 rebounds , along with 14 assists , two steals and two blocks , in 38 minutes . Westbrook has been on a tear over his last three games , averaging 31 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists , while shooting 50 percent from the field . Enes Kanter added 13 points on 6 - 8 shooting , in 16 minutes , while Dion Waiters had eight points ( 2 - 6 FG ) in 34 minutes . Serge Ibaka had a quiet game , with nine points ( 4 - 11 FG ) but grabbed seven boards , in 35 minutes . With the win the Thunder are now 3 - 1 at home , while the Magic are 1 - 2 on the road this season . Up next , the Magic will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back , while Oklahoma City will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los Angeles Clippers 104 - 96 at Verizon Center on Friday . The Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Wizards ( 16 6 ) had other ideas . In fact , Washington outscored Los Angeles by 20 points in the second half to pull away and secure the victory . The Wizards shot 49 percent from the field and 56 percent from three - point range , while holding the Clippers to just 43 percent shooting . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Washington recording 28 assists to 14 turnovers , while Los Angeles committed 18 turnovers to just 14 assists . Bradley Beal was the player of the game , as he scored a game - high 29 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , including 4 - for - 7 from long range . Marcin Gortat was second on the team , with 18 points and two blocks . John Wall recorded a double - double , totaling 10 points and 11 assists . Kris Humphries finished with 11 points , eight rebounds , three steals and one block . Chris Paul led the Clippers with 19 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Blake Griffin was the only other Clipper in double figures , totaling 14 points , two rebounds and three assists . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 12 points , three rebounds , one assist and two steals . DeAndre Jordan recorded 11 points and eight rebounds . Matt Barnes and J.J. Redick each scored 11 points a piece , with the former adding six rebounds and one assist , and the latter providing four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Los Angeles will look to bounce back on Sunday in a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . Washington , meanwhile , will travel to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Sunday .

The Sacramento Kings ( 22 - 31 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 8 - 45 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Kings were able to hold off the Sixers in this one , as they outscored them 39 - 23 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Sixers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , but DeMarcus Cousins and Rajon Rondo were too much for the Sixers to handle . Cousins finished with 28 points and 12 rebounds , while Rondo finished with 14 points and 15 assists . Rudy Gay was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 22 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting from the field . Avery Bradley chipped in 17 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds , along with three assists , two steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Kelly Olynyk was huge off the bench , with 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) , nine rebounds , one assist and three steals , in 27 minutes . Jared Sullinger recorded his second double - double in a row , with 11 points and 10 rebounds , while Amir Johnson added 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) , five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 19 minutes . The Suns were led by Eric Bledsoe , who went 5 - 13 from the floor and 4 - 7 from beyond the arc , to score 22 points , in 21 minutes . Brandon Knight finished with 16 points and four assists , while P.J . Tucker had seven points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and two assists , in 26 minutes . Next up , the Suns will head home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Celtics will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .
The Miami Heat ( 10 - 20 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 21 ) 115 - 107 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 36 - 25 in the first quarter and 36 - 20 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Lakers to just 35 points in the third quarter , while also out - rebounding them 47 - 40 and outscoring them 33 - 27 in the fourth quarter . Hassan Whiteside led the Heat in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and 13 rebounds , while Goran Dragic added 21 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , seven assists and two rebounds , in 36 minutes . Justise Winslow chipped in with a double - double of 23 points and 13 boards , in 42 minutes . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , with 19 points ( 8 - 11 FG ) , eight rebounds , six assists and one block , in 26 minutes , while James Johnson added 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) and six assists , in 34 minutes . The Lakers were led by Julius Randle , who had 27 points and 12 rebounds in 28 minutes . Nick Young was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 20 points , while D'Angelo Russell added 17 points and seven assists , but shot just 7 - for 16 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from three - point range , in 32 minutes . Next up , the Lakers play the second game of a back - to back against the Orlando Magic on Friday , in which they will look to get back on track . Miami plays host to the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 105 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) came into Wednesday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , and they did n't disappoint . They jumped out to a 35 - 25 lead after one quarter and never looked back , outscoring the Pacers by a margin of 65 - 42 over the second and third periods . Washington 's defense was key , as they held Indiana to 44 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while also forcing them to commit 18 turnovers on the night . Paul George was the player of the game , as he tallied 34 points , three rebounds and four assists on 10 - of - 20 shooting . Jeff Teague finished second on the team , accruing 19 points , two rebounds and 11 assists . Myles Turner totaled 15 points , eight rebounds and three blocks . Thaddeus Young totaled 11 points , six rebounds , three assists and six steals . John Wall led the way for the Wizards , accumulating 36 points , 11 rebounds and nine assists . Otto Porter , Jr. finished with 22 points , while Marcin Gortat recorded a 13 - point , 16 - rebound double - double . Bradley Beal and Markieff Morris each totaled 10 points , seven rebounds and one assist . Up next , the Wizards will head home to take on the Nets on Friday , while the Pacers will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .

The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 30 - 30 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . The Blazers shot 63 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves shot just 49 percent , as they were out - rebounded by the Blazers 35 - 27 . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who finished with 20 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , two assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns was the only other Timberwolve to score in double figures , as he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG ) , five rebounds and five steals , in 31 minutes . Gorgui Dieng finished with 13 points , seven rebounds , four steals and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Ricky Rubio added 16 points of his own , while Shabazz Muhammad added 17 points , four rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 28 minutes off the bench . Next , the Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . Portland will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday , in what will be the second game of a back - to - back for the Trail Blazers .
The Utah Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) 114 - 109 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 29 - 20 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Knicks never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Knicks were led by Kristaps Porzingis , who scored 28 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and two blocks in 33 minutes . He 's now scored at least 20 points in each of his last three games , as he 's been a force on both ends of the floor . Carmelo Anthony on the other hand had 28 points of his own , going 12 - 20 from the field and 0 - 6 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding nine rebounds and three assists in 35 minutes . Derrick Rose had a solid all - around game as well , finishing with 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and eight assists in 36 minutes . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Courtney Lee , who chipped in 10 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3PT ) , while Joakim Noah had four points and five rebounds in 20 minutes . Gordon Hayward and George Hill led the Jazz in scoring with 28 and 23 points , respectively . Hayward added five rebounds and four steals , while Hill added eight assists and two steals . Rodney Hood added 18 points , six rebounds and five assists in 38 minutes . Rudy Gobert finished with 13 points ( 5 - 6 FG ) , eight rebounds , three blocks and one assist , while Derrick Favors added 13 points and six rebounds in 27 minutes . Next up , the Jazz will head home to take on the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Boston to play the Celtics on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 34 - 6 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) 127 - 107 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this blowout win . Golden State shot 56 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pistons to just 49 percent shooting and 21 percent from long range . They also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 39 - 40 . The Pistons were led by Marcus Morris , who scored 21 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , while also adding five rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris was the only other Piston to score in double figures , as he finished with 18 points ( 8 - 15 FG ) and four rebounds . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 12 points and 10 rebounds , while Reggie Jackson scored 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) to go along with three assists and two rebounds . The only two other players scored in double digits for the Pistons , as no other player scored more than six points . The game was dominated by the Warriors in the first half , as they outscored the Pistons by a 37 - 30 margin . Kevin Durant led all scorers with 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , along with nine assists , six rebounds and six steals , in 31 minutes . Klay Thompson was n't far behind , finishing with 23 points and three rebounds , in 36 minutes . Ian Clark chipped in with 14 points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals , as the only bench player to score more than seven points , in 16 minutes off the bench . Next up for the Warriors is a matchup with the Utah Jazz on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back for both teams . Meanwhile , the Pistons will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

Quincy Acy was productive off the bench as well , tallying seven points and five rebounds in 19 minutes . The Nets shot just 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Sixers hit just 43 percent of their shots overall .

The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the final playoff spot in the Western Conference playoff race . In fact , Milwaukee led for the entirety of the second and third quarters , as the Trail Blazers never led by more than seven points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Milwaukee recording 22 assists to just 16 turnovers , while Portland committed 21 turnovers to just 21 assists . Lillard led the team in scoring , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds and seven assists on 8 - of - 19 shooting . He also had five turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the All-Star point guard . Dwyane Wade chipped in 16 points and five rebounds in 39 minutes . Hassan Whiteside was huge off the bench , scoring 19 points and grabbing 18 rebounds , to go along with six blocked shots . Luol Deng finished with 13 points ( 5 - 18 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) and 16 rebounds in 37 minutes . Tyler Johnson was the most valuable bench player , scoring 15 points and handing out four assists in 40 minutes , while James Johnson added 15 points , seven rebounds and four steals . The two teams will meet again on Friday , with the Heat hosting the Wizards and the Pacers hosting the Nets .

The Mavs will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Rockets .

The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 23 - 26 in the first quarter and 27 - 19 in the second quarter . The Nets were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were n't able to keep up with the Wizards in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 27 - 20 , giving the Wizards the victory in front of their home crowd . The Boston Celtics ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 16 ) 111 - 93 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 25 - 19 in the first quarter and 30 - 23 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 49 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pelicans to 41 percent shooting from the floor and 31 percent from long range . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 16 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) , six rebounds and three blocked shots in 30 minutes . He did n't have much help from anyone else , as the only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Ryan Anderson , who came off the bench and finished with 18 points ( 7 - 17 FG ) and nine rebounds in 34 minutes . Tyreke Evans was held scoreless in 18 minutes , while Eric Gordon went scoreless over 16 minutes before fouling out in 16 minutes . Ryan Anderson was the high - point man for the Pelicans , as he finished with 14 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) , to go along with six assists , two rebounds and one steal in 22 minutes . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for New Orleans , as they 've now lost four of their last five games . Jared Sullinger led the way for the Celtics with 21 points and five assists in 27 minutes . Isaiah Thomas finished with 22 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 4 - 4 3PT ) , five assists and two rebounds , while Jae Crowder added 17 points and three blocks in 35 minutes . Crowder has been the Celtics ' best player over his last two games , combining for 49 points and 17 rebounds over that span . The only other player to score in double figures for Boston was Avery Bradley , who chipped in 11 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and four assists in 29 minutes . With the win , the Celtics improved to 10 - 4 on the road this season and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 'll head home to take on the second night of a back - to - back against the Orlando Magic on Friday . The Pelican , on the other hand , will look to get back on track on Friday when they host the Los Angeles Lakers .

San Antonio 's next game will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Chicago Bulls , 107 - 100 , at TD Garden on Friday . The Celtics ( 3 - 1 ) have been dominant at home this season , and they did it again on Friday , as they took down the Bulls ( 2 - 2 ) in dominating fashion . Boston shot 47 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while holding the Bulls to just 43 percent shooting and 35 percent from long range . They also dominated the rebounding battle , winning that battle , 39 - 39 , and out - rebounding Chicago , 49 - 49 . The Bulls were led by Jimmy Butler , who tallied 23 points and nine rebounds . Rajon Rondo finished with 12 points , nine rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Dwyane Wade chipped in 15 points , four assists and two steals . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to provide 17 points and six rebounds . Taj Gibson was the only other Bull to score in double figures , as he totaled eight points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Jimmy Butler 's 23 points led all Bulls scorers . Amir Johnson led the Celtics in scoring , dropping 23 points on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Isaiah Thomas was second on the team with 23 points , 10 assists and three steals . Jae Crowder , Tyler Zeller and Avery Bradley each scored 11 points , while Tyler Ulis had seven points and five rebounds in 34 minutes of action . Boston 's next game is on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Sunday . Chicago will look to get back on track as they travel to New York to take on the Knicks on Saturday .

Carmelo Anthony went just 5 - of - 21 from the field to score 13 points , while also handing out eight assists . Greg Monroe was the player of the game , accumulating 23 points and 18 rebounds . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished second on the team , totaling 20 points , two rebounds and four three - pointers . Andre Drummond recorded a seven - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Brandon Jennings and Josh Smith both finished with 12 points and 10 rebounds , respectively . Detroit will look to build off this win on Monday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 10 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 1 ) 113 - 100 in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena to take a 1 - 1 series lead over the Celtics . Kyrie Irving scored a game - high 30 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 5 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) to lead the way for the Cavs , who shot 45 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range . Irving added three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 41 minutes . LeBron James followed up with 20 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3PT ) , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals in 42 minutes . Kevin Love added 19 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 7 - 8 FT ) , 12 rebounds and four assists in 33 minutes , while Tristan Thompson chipped in 12 points and six rebounds in 26 minutes off the bench . J.R. Smith and Timofey Mozgov combined for just nine points on 3 - of - 9 shooting in 19 minutes . The Celtics were led by Kelly Olynyk’s 22 points and 10 assists in 32 minutes . Evan Turner added 12 points , seven rebounds and five assists in 34 minutes . Marcus Smart scored 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) , while Brandon Bass and Marcus Smart each added 10 points and Marcus Morris scored 12 points in 18 minutes . Isaiah Thomas was held out of the game with a sore knee . Game 2 will take place in Boston on Tuesday . Game 3 will be held in Cleveland .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 20 - 15 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 14 - 21 ) 117 - 116 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 27 - 24 in the first quarter and 29 - 20 in the second quarter , but the Kings battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Mavericks were able to out - score the Kings 28 - 20 over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Mavs were led by Deron Williams , who finished with 25 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , four assists and two steals , in 43 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki followed up with 23 points ( 8 - 19 FG ) , five rebounds and three assists , while Wesley Matthews added 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) and four assists , in 42 minutes . Zaza Pachulia recorded a double - double with nine points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 17 rebounds , in 40 minutes , while Devin Harris chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 6 - 9 FT ) to go along with 11 rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 17 minutes off the bench . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Kings , with 35 points ( 15 - 30 FG , 2 – 6 3PT ) , 17 rebounds and six blocked shots , in 49 minutes . Rudy Gay added 31 points ( 13 - 20 FG ) of his own , along with five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 48 minutes . Darren Collison added 14 points and 12 assists , but it was n't enough to keep up with the Mavericks . The Kings shot 48 percent from the field and 38 percent from deep , while the Mavericks shot 46 percent ( 41 percent FG ) from the floor and 41 percent from beyond the arc . Up next , the Kings will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back set . Dallas will look to keep their winning streak alive as they play host to the Grizzlies on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 105 - 102 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . The Hawks ( 20 - 7 ) came into Wednesday 's contest as a double - digit favorite , but the Mavs gave them a run for their money in the fourth quarter , outscoring them by a 39 - 23 margin over the final 12 minutes . Dennis Schroder 's 22 points led the way for Atlanta , and he added six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Kyle Korver was next with 18 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Paul Millsap posted a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and a pair of blocks . Al Horford and DeMarre Carroll turned in matching 17 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds and two assists , and the latter registering seven rebounds , a steal and a block . Millsap also hauled in 12 rebounds , dished out seven assists , recorded two blocks and recorded two steals and two blocks . Schroder was 9 - of - 15 from the field and hit all five of his three - point attempts . Monta Ellis led the Mavericks with 18 point , two rebounds , two assists and four steals . Dirk Nowitzki managed 16 points , six rebounds , an assist and a blocked shot . Rajon Rondo tallied 13 points , 11 assists , four boards , three steals and three blocks . Tyson Chandler posted a modest eight points but hauled in 19 rebounds and blocked two shots . J.J. Barea led the bench with 14 points , along with six rebounds and an assist , while Devin Harris was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points . The Mavericks ( 19 - 9 ) remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They 're home again on Friday when they take on the Trail Blazers .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 35 - 8 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 29 ) 110 - 91 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 25 - 21 in the first quarter and 36 - 22 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to the victory , shooting 50 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pacers to 40 percent shooting from the floor and only 20 percent from beyond the arc . Jeff Teague led the Hawks in scoring with 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 30 minutes . DeMarre Carroll added 17 points of his own , while Al Horford chipped in 14 points , seven rebounds and five assists , in 27 minutes . Paul Millsap finished with 12 points and nine rebounds , while Kyle Korver added 10 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 31 minutes . The Pacers were led by C.J . Miles , who came off the bench and scored 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 8 3PT ) , in just 27 minutes , while Rodney Stuckey added 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and three rebounds , in 23 minutes . David West finished with nine points ( 3 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds , along with four assists , one steal and one block , in 28 minutes . Next up , the Pacers play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Meanwhile , the Hawks play host to the Nets on Friday , in what will be the second of a home - and - home set .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 23 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 23 - 32 ) 109 - 104 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Hawks were able to hold off a late comeback from the Trail Blazers , as they out - scored the Blazers 33 - 23 in the fourth quarter to secure the win . The Trail Blazers led by as many as 12 points in the first half , but the Hawks came out strong in the second half and took a 10 - point lead into the locker room . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the Hawks in scoring with 25 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 43 minutes . Dennis Schroder added 22 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and four assists , in 42 minutes . Dwight Howard finished with 19 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 9 - 16 FT ) of his own , along with 16 rebounds , three blocked shots , two steals and one assist , in 38 minutes , while Paul Millsap added 21 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 12 - 12 FT ) with nine rebounds , five assists , five blocks and two steals , in 41 minutes . C.J . McCollum led the way for the Blazers , with 26 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Damian Lillard finished with 21 points , six rebounds and three assists , while Maurice Harkless chipped in 17 points ( 7 - 15 FG ) and nine rebounds . Meyers Leonard left the game after 24 minutes with a sprained left knee and did not return . The Blazers shot 36 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Hawks shot 39 percent from deep and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was Allen Crabbe , who finished with 14 points and 15 rebounds , in 39 minutes off the bench . Next up , the Hawks play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Golden State Warriors on Friday , while Portland hosts the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 36 - 23 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 25 - 34 ) 124 - 121 at Staples Center on Wednesday . The Clippers were expected to win this game easily and they did just that , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 40 - plus minutes . The key for Los Angeles was their defense , as the Hornets were held to 48 percent shooting from the field and 45 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 27 assists to just nine turnovers , while the Hornets committed 16 turnovers to just 16 assists . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum , who each scored a team - high 34 points each . Batum added eight rebounds and four assists , while Walker added two rebounds and two assists of his own . Frank Kaminsky was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 16 points , five rebounds and five assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 19 points , six rebounds and three steals . Blake Griffin led the way for the Clippers with 43 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two steals on 15 - of - 26 shooting . DeAndre Jordan recorded a 20 - point , 19 - rebound double - double , while Chris Paul had 15 points , nine rebounds and 17 assists . J.J. Redick was second on the team with 22 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . The only other Clipper to reach double figures was Jamal Crawford Williams , who scored five points in 20 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Clippers will look to extend their win streak to five games , as it will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Friday . Charlotte , on the other hand , will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday for their next game .

Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson tied the NBA record for most three - pointers made in a single game , as they each drained three from behind the arc . The Toronto Raptors ( 20 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) 113 - 103 in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at TD Garden to take a 2 - 1 lead in the series . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 23 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 12 - 14 FT ) , along with seven rebounds , six assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Kyle Lowry followed up with 14 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 8 - 10 FT ) and nine assists , in 34 minutes , while DeMarre Carroll chipped in 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 4 - 7 3PT ) , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 36 minutes . The Raptors shot 44 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range , while the Celtics shot 38 percent from deep and 27 percent from long range . Jonas Valanciunas played 23 minutes and finished with six points ( 2 - 6 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 23 minutes . Isaiah Thomas was the high - point man for the Celtics , with 25 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 10 - 11 FT ) in 29 minutes off the bench , while Marcus Smart and Jae Crowder combined for just 11 points on 2 - of - 11 shooting , in 28 minutes . Avery Bradley finished with 13 points and five rebounds in 30 minutes . Tyler Zeller finished with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) . The Celtics were out - rebounded by the Raptors 53 - 38 . Game 3 will take place in Boston on Tuesday , in Boston .
The Miami Heat ( 32 - 34 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 38 - 28 ) 104 - 89 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 32 - 26 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Raptors never led by more than seven points in the second half . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who finished with 17 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , four rebounds and two assists , in 28 minutes . Norman Powell was the only other player to score in double figures for the Raptors , as he finished with 14 points and one rebound , in 35 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double with 10 points and 10 rebounds , in 21 minutes , while Terrence Ross chipped in 13 points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 25 minutes off the bench . Dion Waiters led the way for the Heat , with 20 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 6 3PT ) , five assists , one rebound and one steal , in 33 minutes . Goran Dragic finished with 15 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Hassan Whiteside finished with 12 points , 14 rebounds and four blocks , in 32 minutes . Tyler Johnson was the high - point man for Miami , with 16 points on 6 - 12 shooting , along with three rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . Wayne Ersue , while James Johnson added 12 points on 4 - 10 shooting , including 0 - 3 from three - point range , in 26 minutes . James Johnson chipped - in with 11 points , five rebounds and five assists in just 19 minutes , in his second game back after missing the last two with an ankle injury . The win puts the Heat in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and a half game ahead of the eighth - place Nets . They 're home again on Friday , when they take on the Trail Blazers . Meanwhile , the Raptors head to Orlando to take on their division rival Magic .
The Detroit Pistons ( 24 - 28 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 33 ) 113 - 96 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 24 - 19 in the first quarter . The Sixers were n't able to match that early on , as the Pistons out - scored them 34 - 21 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a comfortable victory in front of their home crowd . Detroit shot 47 percent from the field and 23 percent from three - point range , while the Sixers shot just 42 percent and 18 percent from long range . They also out - rebounded the Sixers 60 - 41 and forced them into 19 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own . Philadelphia was led by Jahlil Okafor , who tallied 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 2 - 7 FT ) and four rebounds in 26 minutes . T.J. McConnell was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and two assists in 25 minutes . Robert Covington finished with 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and three steals in 29 minutes , while Dario Saric chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 5 3PT ) , six rebounds and four assists in 28 minutes off the bench . Marcus Morris led the way for the Pistons with 19 points ( 9 - 16 FG ) , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal in 39 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double with 16 points and 17 rebounds , while Reggie Jackson finished with 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG ) and six assists . Jon Leuer and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope each added 12 points , five rebounds and three assists , respectively , while Tobias Harris and Ish Smith were the only bench players to score in double digits . Harris finished with nine points ( 3 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , and eight rebounds in 27 minutes , and Smith had 11 points and five assists in 20 minutes . The 76ers return home to host the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while Detroit travels to Charlotte to take on the Hornets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Houston Rockets , 128 - 120 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Wednesday to take a 4 - 2 lead in the Western Conference first - round playoffs . The Rockets ( 2 - 2 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) had other ideas . Cleveland outscored the Rockets 29 - 24 in the first quarter and never looked back , as they never trailed after that . The Cavaliers shot 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Rockets to 48 percent shooting and 39 percent from long range . James Harden led the way for the Rockets , as he tallied 41 points , 15 assists and seven rebounds in 38 minutes . Eric Gordon finished with 16 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals in 33 minutes . Trevor Ariza finished with 11 points , one rebound and two assists in 31 minutes . Ryan Anderson finished with 12 points , four rebounds and one assist in 30 minutes . No other starter scored in double figures for Houston , as Eric Gordon , Eric Gordon and Nene Hilario combined for just 13 points on 4 - of - 18 shooting . James Johnson led the bench with 13 points , five rebounds and four assists in 25 minutes . Kyrie Irving led all scorers with 32 points on 10 - of 19 shooting , while LeBron James added 19 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists in 36 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 24 points and five rebounds , while J.R. Smith chipped in 15 points and three rebounds in 34 minutes . Tristan Thompson was the only other Cavalier to score in double digits , totaling four points , 10 rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . The Cavs will face the second game of a back - to - back as they travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Friday , while the Rockets will host the Trail Blazers .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 20 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 1 - 1 ) 95 - 78 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 26 - 16 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for the Timberwolves with 28 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) , 14 rebounds and four blocks in 33 minutes . Andrew Wiggins finished with 18 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and four rebounds in 31 minutes , while Ricky Rubio chipped in 12 points ( 2 - 8 FG ) , eight assists , five rebounds and one steal in 30 minutes . Kevin Garnett started at power forward in place of the injured Shabazz Muhammad and finished with four points and six rebounds in 22 minutes . The Nuggets were led by Emmanuel Mudiay and Danilo Gallinari , who each finished with 10 points and 10 points respectively . Kenneth Faried finished with nine points and 15 rebounds in 27 minutes . Joffrey Lauvergne added 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG ) and five rebounds in 16 minutes . Wilson Chandler was the only other Nugget to score in double figures , finishing with 14 points in 29 minutes off the bench . The Wolves ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 50 - 21 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 57 ) 103 - 82 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 30 - 20 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Zach Randolph , who finished with 23 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds and five assists , in 35 minutes . Marc Gasol added 21 points and eight rebounds of his own , in 32 minutes , while Jeff Green chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and three rebounds , in 34 minutes . Mike Conley struggled shooting , going 3 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - of - 2 from the three - point line to score seven points , while also adding four assists and one rebound , in 26 minutes . Zach Randolph has been one of the few bright spots for the Grizzlies this season , as he 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The Knicks were led in scoring by Langston Galloway , who went 7 - for 16 from the floor and 2 - for 5 from beyond the arc to finish with 19 points , along with seven rebounds , five assists and a steal , in 43 minutes . Andrea Bargnani added 18 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3Pd , 1st half ) , four assists , one rebound and two blocked shots , in 31 minutes . Lance Thomas chipped - in 15 points ( 6 - 12 ) , two rebounds , one assist , two steals and two steals , in 38 minutes . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Langston Bargniniad , who chipped 16 points , in 28 minutes off the bench , while the only other player to score in double figures for the Knicks was Lance Thomas , who added 15 points , to go along with two rebounds and one assist . Despite the loss , the Knicks have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to battle for the eight - seed in the East . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Meanwhile , the Grizzlies will look to extend their win streak to five games when they take on the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers ( 5 - 18 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 7 - 16 ) 99 - 88 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The 76ers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 26 - 12 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the Pelicans to just 12 points in the second quarter , while also out - rebounding them 46 - 47 . The Sixers were also able to shoot 43 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range , while the Pelicans shot just 39 percent and 28 percent , respectively . Ersan Ilyasova led the Sixers in scoring with 23 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 32 minutes . Sergio Rodriguez added 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 4 - 8 3PT ) and eight assists , while Joel Embiid chipped in with 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists , three steals and four blocks , in 27 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 26 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 10 - 12 FT ) and 11 rebounds , along with two assists and two blocked shots , in 41 minutes . Jrue Holiday came up big in 28 minutes off the bench , as he finished with 19 points and four rebounds , while Tyreke Evans added eight points and nine rebounds , in 20 minutes . Tim Frazier started at point guard and finished with seven points ( 3 - 7 FG ) , six rebounds and six assists , in 29 minutes . Buddy Hield finished with six points , four rebounds and two assists in 34 minutes . Up next , the 76ers will head home to take on the Houston Rockets on Friday , while New Orleans will stay home and go up against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 96 - 89 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 1 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to get there . In fact , Utah outscored Los Angeles , 31 - 24 , in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . The key for the Jazz was their shooting , as they went 41 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers finished at 38 percent and 39 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Utah recording 14 assists to 14 turnovers , while Los Angeles committed 14 turnovers to just 16 assists . The Lakers ( 0 - 2 ) had a tough task here without Kobe Bryant , but they were still able to come out with a win . Lou Williams was the player of the game , as he led the team with 17 points and six assists off the bench . Luol Deng recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points and 12 rebounds . Nick Young was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 13 points and one block . D'Angelo Russell struggled shooting , going 3 - of - 14 from the floor and 1 - of 5 from long range . On deck for the Lakers is a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday . This marks the Jazz 's first win of the season and they 'll look to keep it rolling in their next game against the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday . George Hill was the star of the show , leading the Jazz with 23 points , three rebounds and three assists . Rudy Gobert finished with 13 points , 13 rebounds and four blocks . Rodney Hood was second on the team , totaling 15 points , six rebounds and one assist . Alec Burks was a nice spark off the pine as well with 15 points and eight rebounds . The only other Jazz player to reach double figures was Joe Johnson , who finished with 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Utah will look to build off this win on Monday in a home matchup with the Denver Nuggets .
The Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 10 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 5 - 16 ) 101 - 92 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . Rudy Gay led the way for the Kings with a game - high 29 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , three steals and one block , in 33 minutes . The Kings shot 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Jazz shot 41 percent and 18 percent , respectively , from the floor and three - point range . Darren Collison added 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and six assists , in 32 minutes , while Jason Thompson chipped in 10 points ( 3 - 8 FG ) and nine rebounds , in 36 minutes . Ben McLemore started in place of DeMarcus Cousins ( knee ) and finished with six points ( 2 - 5 FG , 2 - 2 3PT ) and one assist , in 18 minutes . Willie Cauley-Stein had 15 points and eight rebounds in 30 minutes off the bench . The Jazz were led by Gordon Hayward and Alec Burks , who finished with 19 points each , along with seven assists , four rebounds and four steals , in 37 minutes . Trey Burke added 13 points ( 4 - 13 FG ) , five assists and two rebounds , while Enes Kanter finished with 13 points , six rebounds and two blocks , in 31 minutes . Derrick Favors had nine points and six rebounds in 26 minutes . Next up , the Jazz play the second game of a back - to back of their current four - game road trip , when they host the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Sacramento plays host to the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday night .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Indiana Pacers , 90 - 85 , at United Center on Wednesday . The Bulls ( 15 - 16 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they led by double - digits for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as the Bulls held the Pacers to 42 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Chicago winning that battle , 48 - 40 . Chicago also dominated in the paint , winning the rebounding battle , 52 - 36 . Indiana ( 14 - 17 ) has now lost four of their last five games , as this was their worst loss of the season . Myles Turner was the only starter in double figures , as he tallied 16 points and eight rebounds . C.J . Miles led the team in scoring off the bench , dropping 19 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Paul George finished with 14 points , three rebounds and eight assists . Thaddeus Young accrued 12 points , six rebounds and three steals . On deck for the Pacers is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . Chicago was led by Dwyane Wade , who accumulated 21 points , five assists , three boards and two blocks . Jimmy Butler finished second on the team , accruing 16 points , seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . Nikola Mirotic led the bench in scoring , dropping 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Chicago will look to keep rolling on Friday in a home matchup with the Milwaukee Bucks .

The Toronto Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 6 - 7 ) 91 - 80 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but the Raptors had other ideas . They outscored the Clippers 33 - 11 in the second quarter and held them to just 11 points the rest of the way . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 37 percent from the field , while the Clippers finished at 39 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Raptors recording 15 assists to 15 turnovers and the Clippers committing 19 turnovers to just 21 assists . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors in scoring , finishing with 21 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 13 - 14 FT ) , six rebounds and three assists , in 40 minutes . Luis Scola was the only other player to score in double figures for the Raptors , as he finished with 20 points and eight rebounds , in 31 minutes . Chris Paul recorded 13 points , 11 assists and five rebounds , while J.J. Redick finished with 17 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 - 6 3PT ) , in 29 minutes . Blake Griffin struggled shooting , going 4 - for 10 points , to go along with six rebounds , four assists and two steals , while Paul Pierce left the game in the first quarter with a sprained ankle and did n't return . Next up for the Clippers is a road matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Friday . Meanwhile , the Raptors will look to keep their winning streak alive , as they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday in their next game .

The Phoenix Suns ( 19 - 42 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 26 - 35 ) 120 - 103 on Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 28 - 32 in the first quarter and 33 - 12 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Hornets were n't able to keep pace . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who finished with 26 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , eight assists and four rebounds , in 36 minutes . Marvin Williams was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Hornets , as he finished with 19 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) , along with four rebounds and one steal , in 29 minutes . Frank Kaminsky added 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) and two steals , in 32 minutes , while Nicolas Batum chipped in 12 points ( 3 - 15 FG , 2 - 9 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and five assists , in 35 minutes . Meanwhile , the Suns got 16 points and 12 rebounds from Brandon Knight , in 24 minutes off the bench , while T.J. Warren added 16 ( 8 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and eight points , in 27 minutes . Devin Booker finished with 15 points , nine assists and six rebounds , while Marquese Chriss added 17 points and one assist , in 22 minutes . Eric Bledsoe finished with 14 points , seven assists , five rebounds , four steals and one block , in 25 minutes . Phoenix shot 60 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while holding the Hornets to 39 percent shooting and 29 percent from long range . Next up for the Suns is a matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , in which the Suns will look to extend their win streak to five games . Charlotte , on the other hand , has lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Golden State Warriors ( 40 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) 144 - 98 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 31 - 22 in the first quarter and 41 - 22 the rest of the way . They were able to coast to a comfortable victory , as they shot 62 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while holding the Clippers to just 44 percent shooting from the floor and 43 percent from beyond the arc . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors , scoring 43 points ( 15 - 23 FG , 9 - 15 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds and six assists , in 29 minutes . Kevin Durant added 23 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven assists , while Klay Thompson chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 11 2Pt ) and one assist , in 27 minutes . Draymond Green struggled shooting , going just 1 - for - 4 , but still finished with five points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , in 26 minutes . Marreese Speights came off the bench to score 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and grab four rebounds , in 19 minutes . The Clippers were led by Blake Griffin , who shot 9 - 14 ( 0 - 1 FG ) , on his way to 20 points , in 23 minutes . J.J. Redick was the only other Clipper to reach double figures , as he finished with 13 points ( 3 - 5 3PT ) , along with one rebound and one steal , in 25 minutes . Austin Rivers finished with 10 points , six assists and two rebounds , while DeAndre Jordan added eight points and five rebounds . Up next , the Warriors will head home to take on the 76ers on Friday , while the Clippers will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Washington Wizards ( 45 - 33 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 61 ) 119 - 90 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Wizards got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 35 - 24 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to coast to a comfortable victory , as they shot 65 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while the Sixers shot just 35 percent from deep . Ramon Sessions and Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards , scoring 19 and 21 points , respectively , while Marcin Gortat added 18 points ( 8 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds , six assists and four blocks in 26 minutes . Washington also got 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt ) and seven rebounds ( 6 - 8 FT ) from their bench . Robert Covington was the high - point man for the Sixers , as he scored 27 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , including 4 - 6 from long range , to go along with three rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 24 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Philadelphia was Jahlil Okafor , who chipped in 17 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) in 21 minutes off the bench . Nerlens Noel was the only other Philly player to reach double figures , with five points ( 2 - 8 FG ) , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal , in just 24 minutes , while Jerami Grant got the start at power forward and finished with six points , two rebounds and two steals , in 27 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday . The Sixers will look to get back on track on Friday , when they play host to the Heat .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 34 - 17 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 29 - 23 ) 100 - 93 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Clippers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Heat to just 40 percent shooting from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 17 assists to six turnovers , while the Heat committed 13 turnovers to just 14 assists . Chris Paul led the way for the Clippers , as he tallied 22 points ( 8 - 23 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , seven assists and two rebounds in 34 minutes . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , providing 20 points ( 7 - 19 FG ) , two assists and one rebound . DeAndre Jordan recorded his first double - double of the season , totaling nine points ( 3 - 4 FG , 3 - 14 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 35 minutes . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was J.J. Redick , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG ) and two steals in 32 minutes . Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade were the only two Heat players to score in double figures , as Bosh finished with 17 points and five rebounds , while Wade added 17 points , three rebounds and three assists . Goran Dragic and Luol Deng each scored 17 points of their own , while Hassan Whiteside chipped in 10 points and 10 rebounds in 17 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head home Friday to take on the road to play the Trail Blazers , while Miami will stay home Friday and go up against the Hawks .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 13 ) 95 - 93 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 20 - 16 in the first quarter , but the Suns battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Grizzlies out - scored the Suns 28 - 25 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Marc Gasol led the way for the Grizzlies with 22 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , eight rebounds and two blocks in 37 minutes . Zach Randolph finished with 10 points ( 5 - 16 FG ) and nine rebounds , while Mike Conley chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , six assists , three steals and one block in 34 minutes . Vince Carter was huge off the bench for Memphis , scoring 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) , to go along with six assists and four rebounds in 28 minutes . The Suns were led by Eric Bledsoe , who finished with 23 points , seven rebounds and six assists in 40 minutes . Brandon Knight added 17 points , four rebounds and five assists , while Alex Len added 12 points and seven rebounds in 32 minutes . Jon Leuer finished with a double - double ( 10 points and 11 rebounds ) , while Mirza Teletovic added 14 points and six rebounds in 24 minutes . Up next , the Suns will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Grizzlies will go on the road to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 25 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 46 - 9 ) 132 - 110 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 42 - 30 in the first quarter and 37 - 24 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Warriors were n't able to keep up with the hot shooting of the Nuggets , who shot 55 percent from the field and 59 percent from three - point range . They also out - rebounded the Warriors 52 - 27 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . The Warriors were led by Kevin Durant , who finished with 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , four rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block , in 27 minutes . Patrick McCaw followed up with 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , two assists and one rebound , while JaVale McGee chipped in with eight points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and seven rebounds , in 16 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Warriors was Marreese Speights , who came off the bench and finished with 18 points and two steals , in 26 minutes . J.J. Barea was the only other Golden State player in double figures , with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , to go along with two assists , in 18 minutes , while Shaun Livingston added 15 points , two rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots , in 19 minutes off of the bench . Jameer Nelson led the Nuggets in scoring , with 23 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 5 - 7 3PT , 0 - 0 FT ) and dished out seven assists , along with three rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Will Barton added 24 points and 10 rebounds , while Nikola Jokic recorded a double - double with 17 points and 21 rebounds , including 12 on the offensive glass . Jusuf Nurkic added 14 points and four assists , as well , in 23 minutes . Hernangomez finished with 27 points , 10 rebounds and two assists in 43 minutes . Gary Harris added 16 points , while Will Barton finished with 14 points , four assists and two rebounds . Both teams return to action on Friday , when the Warriors host the Portland Trail Blazers , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Lakers .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 5 - 2 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) 110 - 106 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference finals to take a 2 - 1 lead in the series . The Hawks were able to out - rebound the Cavaliers 50 - 39 and out - assist them 50 to 39 , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull out the win . Dennis Schroder led the Hawks with 28 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , six assists and two rebounds in 32 minutes . Kent Bazemore added 25 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) and six rebounds in 33 minutes . Paul Millsap finished with 21 points and five rebounds in 36 minutes , while Dwight Howard chipped in seven points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) to go with 17 rebounds , three blocks and two assists in 27 minutes . The Cavaliers were led by Kyrie Irving , who finished with 29 points ( 11 - 27 FG ) , four assists and one rebound in 39 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 24 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) , 12 rebounds and three steals in 38 minutes . LeBron James finished with 23 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block in 37 minutes . J.R. Smith struggled shooting , going 2 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - 10 from the three - point line to finish with six points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . The only other Cavalier to score in double figures was Channing Tristan Thompson , who scored zero points in 25 minutes . Game 7 will take place in Atlanta on Friday night . Game 8 will be held in Cleveland on Saturday night .

The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 25 - 25 in the first quarter and 36 - 20 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the Lakers to just 43 percent shooting from the field and 26 percent from three - point range , while also out - rebounding them 52 - 41 .
