Jon Leuer followed up with 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG ) , three rebounds , three assists and one steal in 34 minutes , while Tobias Harris chipped in 19 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and five rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Marcus Morris added 14 points , six rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . The Lakers were led by Brandon Ingram , who finished with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and five assists . Julius Randle was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 17 points and six rebounds in 30 minutes . D'Angelo Russell was limited to just two points ( 1 - 2 FG ) in 23 minutes , as he shot just 1 - of - 2 from the floor and finished with five turnovers . Lou Williams was the high - point man for the Lakers , scoring 12 points ( 3 - 10 ) and grabbing seven rebounds in 22 minutes . Next up , the Lakers play the second game of a back - to back of their current four - game road trip when they visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday . Detroit plays host to the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , where they 'll look to keep their playoff hopes alive .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 43 - 8 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 11 - 42 ) 106 - 102 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 29 - 20 in the first quarter , but the Lakers battled back to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth quarter . With the Spurs up by six points , the Lakers were able to make a run in the final period , but Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge answered back with a pair of free throws to give the Spurs the lead for good . Leonard finished with 20 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 12 - 15 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 34 minutes , while Aldridge added 26 points and nine rebounds of his own . The two combined to go 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - of - 5 from the free throw line to score a team - high of 26 points , while also adding nine rebounds and two assists . Leonard also had three assists and one steal . The Lakers were led by Kobe Bryant , who finished with 25 points ( 9 - 28 FG , 4 - 14 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) , four assists and two rebounds in 33 minutes . Jordan Clarkson was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Lakers , finishing with 21 points , six rebounds and four assists in 36 minutes . Julius Randle recorded a double - double with 15 points and 16 rebounds , while Lou Williams chipped in 14 points . The only other Lakers player to reach double figures was Jordan Hill , who scored 12 points in 23 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on the road to play the Clippers on Friday , while the Lakers will head home and play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Friday . The Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) have now won three straight games , as they continue to battle for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference standings . Bradley Beal led the way for Washington , scoring a game - high 23 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting in 32 minutes . John Wall added 12 points , 13 assists , four rebounds and four steals , while Markieff Morris chipped in 13 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Otto Porter , Jr. went scoreless in 19 minutes , and Marcin Gortat had a near double - double with 12 points and eight rebounds in 18 minutes . The team shot 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , but struggled from the free - throw line , where they went just 8 - for - 18 . Otto Porter , who was questionable coming into the game with a sore left knee , played just 19 minutes and finished with zero points and three rebounds . The win gives Washington a three - game lead over the Toronto Raptors for third place in the East , but the Raptors still hold the tiebreaker over the Wizards for the second seed . The game marked the return of DeMar DeRozan to Toronto 's starting lineup after he sat out the previous two games with an ankle injury . He finished with 24 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal in 34 minutes . Serge Ibaka added 22 points and 13 rebounds in 36 minutes . Norman Powell came off the bench to score 17 points and grab two rebounds in 16 minutes , while Cory Joseph Joseph Joseph added 11 points and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas had a quiet night with only seven points and 11 rebounds in 21 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Sunday , while the Raptors will head home to play the Heat on Saturday .

The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 32 - 23 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were able to hold the lead for the majority of the game , as the Nets never led by more than seven points in the second half . Rajon Rondo recorded a triple - double , with 13 points , 12 assists , seven rebounds and seven steals , in 29 minutes . Kelly Olynyk led the way for the Celtics , who shot 56 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , as a team . Jeff Green finished with 17 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 2 3P3Pt 7 - 9 - 9 FT , in 36 minutes , while Avery Bradley added 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG ) and two steals . Jared Sullinger added 13 points and four rebounds , in 28 minutes . Marcus Smart and Marcus Smart combined for 21 points ( 9 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Tyler Zeller added 10 points and seven rebounds , along with five assists , five steals , one block and one three - pointer , in 24 minutes . Boston 's next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday . Brooklyn 's will be on the same night , when they host the Charlotte Hornets .

The Raptors were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Sixers by a 38 - 20 margin to finish the game . Gerald Henderson finished with 16 points and two assists , while Jahlil Okafor added 17 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Up next , the 76ers will head to New York to take on the Knicks on Wednesday , while Toronto will travel to Brooklyn on Wednesday to play the Nets .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Orlando Magic , 93 - 89 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Friday . The Magic ( 6 - 8 ) came into Friday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back , having lost three of their previous four games . They were also coming off a tough loss to the Bulls on Thursday , and had lost four of their last five overall . However , they were able to bounce back with a strong performance from their starting backcourt of Serge Ibaka and Evan Fournier . Ibaka led the way for Orlando with 21 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two steals and three blocks . He 's now averaging 16 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Fourniers , meanwhile , scored 18 points and dished out five assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a game - high four times , converting on all four attempts . Jeff Green was the only other Magic starter to score in double figures , posting 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Bucks ( 6 7 ) were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who posted a 21 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included 10 assists , five steals and four blocks . It was his second double - digit scoring effort in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 19 points and 10 rebounds . Jabari Parker was right behind him with 22 points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals . The only other player to score double digits for the Bucks was Mirza Teletovic , who chipped in 14 points off the bench . The game was tight throughout , as neither team led by more than 12 points . The teams will meet again on Sunday , with the Magic visiting the Chicago Bulls and the Bucks hosting the New Orleans Pelicans .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 5 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 8 ) 93 - 80 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Spurs were able to hold off the Lakers in this one , as they out - scored the Lakers 25 - 13 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Lakers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but it took a late run by the Spurs to pull out the win . San Antonio shot 41 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers shot 37 percent from beyond the arc and only 17 percent from long range . Tim Duncan was the player of the game , as he tallied 13 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 11 rebounds in just 25 minutes of play . He 's now averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Kawhi Leonard also had a solid game , finishing with 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) and five rebounds in 18 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line at will , converting on both of his attempts . Tony Parker was the only other Spurs player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 11 points and nine assists in 31 minutes . The only other player to score in double figures for the Spurs was Manu Ginobili , who finished with 14 points and four assists in 26 minutes off the bench . Carlos Boozer was the high - point man for the Lakers , with 19 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds , two steals and one assist in 32 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Boozer , who 's averaging 15 points per game so far this season . Jeremy Lin was the other starter in double - figures , finishing the game with 15 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal in 38 minutes . Kobe Bryant struggled shooting the ball , going 1 - for - 14 from the floor and 0 - 5 from behind the arc to score nine points , while also handing out six assists . He did have four rebounds and six assists , so it was n't all bad for Bryant . Jordan Hill recorded a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double in 28 minutes of action . With the loss , the Lakers have now lost four of their last five games . They 'll look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks . Meanwhile , the Spurs will look to continue their winning ways when they take on the Golden State Warriors on Friday .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the Boston Celtics , 102 - 91 , at TD Garden on Friday . The Pacers ( 5 - 4 ) have been one of the surprise teams of the Eastern Conference this season , and Friday 's win over the Celtics was no exception . Indiana has now won four of their last five games , as they continue to ride Paul George 's hot hand to victories . George led the way with 26 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and one steal on 10 - of - 22 shooting , while C.J . Miles followed up with 17 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Monta Ellis added 13 points , six assists , two rebounds and four steals , while Ian Mahinmi chipped in 11 points , two boards and three blocks . Rodney Stuckey led the bench with 12 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Al Jefferson was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , three rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Evan Turner paced the Celtics with 20 points , while Jared Sullinger posted a double - double with 11 points and 11 rebounds . Isaiah Thomas and Jae Crowder were the only other Boston players to score in double figures , with 14 and five points , respectively . The Celtics shot just 42 percent from the field and 17 percent from three - point range , while the Pacers shot 48 percent and 35 percent from long range . Up next , the Pacers will head home to take on the Wizards on Sunday , while Boston will travel to Toronto to play the Raptors on Saturday .

Mason Plumlee recorded a double - double , with 14 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with three blocks , in 31 minutes . Joe Johnson added 15 points and eight rebounds , in 36 minutes , while Quincy Acy chipped in 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3PT ) , eight rebounds and one assist , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who finished with 20 points and six rebounds , while Monta Ellis added 12 points , five assists , three steals and one rebound , in 38 minutes . J.J. Barea struggled shooting , going 3 - for - 9 from the field and 0 - for 3 points , while Rajon Rondo finished with eight points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , seven rebounds , six assists and four steals , in 28 minutes . Devin Harris was the only other Maverick to score in double figures , as he finished with 12 points and five rebounds in 24 minutes . Next up , the Nets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Mavericks will stay home and play the Grizzlies on Friday .

Kyle Lowry followed up with 21 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 8 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and six assists , while Jonas Valanciunas chipped in 14 points and seven rebounds , in 19 minutes . Gorgui Dieng added 21 points and eight rebounds , while Karl-Anthony Towns finished with 16 points and six rebounds . Ricky Rubio added 12 points and 13 assists in 36 minutes , while Nemanja Bjelica came off the bench to score 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and grab six rebounds in 21 minutes . Despite the loss , the Timberwolves remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're currently slotted in the seventh seed , and are just a half - game behind the eighth - seeded Chicago Bulls , who beat the Raptors in the Eastern Conference standings . Up next , the Raptors will head home Friday to take on the second night of a back - to - back , when they 'll play the Timberwolves , while Minnesota will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday . Derrick Rose 's 30 points led all scorers , while the Bulls shot just 42 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range , as they could n't keep up with the Knicks ' 51 percent shooting from the floor and 43 percent from beyond the arc . Up next , the Knicks will look to keep their playoff hopes alive , when they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Friday , in what will be the second night of a back - to - back , while they 'll look to extend their winning streak to three games . In fact , they held the Nuggets to just 38 percent shooting from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while also out - rebounding them 58 - 47 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 25 assists to just 13 turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 18 turnovers to just 18 assists . The Nuggets were led by Wilson Chandler , who scored a game - high of 32 points ( 12 - 23 FG , 6 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes . Kenneth Faried finished with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) and 17 rebounds , while Randy Foye chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 21 FG , 3 - 12 3PT ) , seven rebounds and eight assists , in 39 minutes . DeAndre Jordan had a monster double - double , with 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) and 21 rebounds , along with three assists and four blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Blake Griffin was the only other Clipper to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 22 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two blocks , in 40 minutes . J.J. Redick added 20 points of his own , in 33 minutes , while Chris Paul finished with 17 points , seven assists and seven rebounds , in 37 minutes . Up next for the Clippers is a matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Friday , in which they will look to extend their winning streak to 10 games . For the Nuggets , they 'll look to get back on track , as they travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday . Meanwhile , the Clippers will stay at home and play the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 89 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 16 - 13 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the NBA over recent weeks , as they 've now won four of their last five games . They 've also been playing some of the best defense in the league , holding opponents to under 100 points in each of those five wins . That trend continued Wednesday , as the Celtics held the Hornets ( 15 - 12 ) to just 36 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . Boston was led by Kelly Olynyk 's 20 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jae Crowder was right behind him with a 19 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included a block . Avery Bradley was next with 18 points , two rebounds and a steal . Isaiah Thomas supplied 18 points and seven assists , while Jared Sullinger supplied eight points , 10 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Jaylen Brown led the bench with 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Hornets were led by a 23 - point effort from Marco Belinelli , who also added seven rebounds , two assists and a block in 31 minutes off the bench . Nicolas Batum supplied 17 points , six rebounds and seven dimes . Kemba Walker and P.J . Hairston were the only other members of the starting five to manage double - digit scoring , with 10 and five points , respectively . Cody Zeller mustered a modest seven points but did haul in 10 rebounds and recorded two assists . Frank Kaminsky Varejao paced the second unit with 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists , three steals and a pair of blocks . The two teams reconvene for a rematch on Friday night at TD Garden , where the Celtics will look to continue their winning ways .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 12 - 13 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 14 ) 104 - 92 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 34 - 20 in the first quarter and 34 - 17 in the second quarter . The Kings were able to make a run in the third quarter , but were n't able to hold off the Thunder in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 23 - 21 in the final 12 minutes . Kevin Durant led the way for the Thunder , as he finished with 26 points and three rebounds , while Russell Westbrook added 32 points , six rebounds , seven assists and four steals of his own . Westbrook shot 11 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points . The only other player to score in double digits for Oklahoma City was Enes Kanter , who finished with 10 points in 18 minutes off the bench . Steven Adams recorded a double - double with five points and 10 rebounds , and Serge Ibaka finished with nine points and six rebounds . Rudy Gay led the Kings in scoring with 22 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and three assists , while Ben McLemore chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , three assists and two rebounds . Darren Collison was the only other Kings starter to reach double figures with six points ( 2 - 8 FG ) and five rebounds . The bench was led by Ty Lawson , who scored 14 points and grabbed four rebounds , in 22 minutes . Up next , the Thunder will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Kings will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 15 - 5 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 4 - 15 ) 123 - 101 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 31 - 23 in the first quarter and 37 - 23 the rest of the way . They shot 57 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves shot just 42 percent and 38 percent from long range . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs with 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , four assists and three rebounds in 27 minutes . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Tim Duncan had a double - double with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Cory Joseph added 18 points and five assists in 33 minutes . Danny Green chipped in 11 points and eight rebounds in 28 minutes , while Manu Ginobili added 20 points and six assists off the bench . The Timberwolves were led by Zach LaVine , who scored 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3PT ) and dished out 10 assists in 42 minutes . It was his second straight strong performance , as he 's combined for 40 points and 12 assists over his last two games . Thaddeus Young had 14 points and four assists in 25 minutes . Shabazz Muhammad was the only other Timberwolve to score in double figures for the Timberwolves , finishing with 20 points in 21 minutes . Andrew Wiggins was held to just six points ( 3 - 13 FG ) and one rebound in 34 minutes . The only other player to reach double figures in points for Minnesota was Nikola Pekovic , who finished with 14 points , 10 rebounds and two assists in 27 minuets . Up next , the Spurs will head home to take on the Grizzlies on Friday , while Minnesota will head to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 45 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 43 - 26 ) 91 - 83 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . LeBron James led the way for the Cavaliers with 33 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block in 38 minutes . Kyrie Irving followed up with 21 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and four assists in 30 minutes , while Kevin Love chipped in 10 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) and nine rebounds in 20 minutes . The Cavaliers shot 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , while the Jazz shot just 42 percent ( 42 percent ) from the floor and 24 percent from deep . The Jazz were led by Rudy Gobert , who recorded a double - double with 20 points ( 10 - 13 FG ) and 19 rebounds in 37 minutes . Joe Johnson was the only other Jazz player to score in double figures , as he finished with 12 points and four rebounds in 29 minutes . Gordon Hayward finished with 13 points ( 4 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds , four assists and one steal in 35 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Joe Ingles added 12 points , four rebounds four assists , one steal and one blocked shot in 36 minutes . Derrick Favors sat this one out with a soreness in his left knee . The Cavs ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , and the Jazz will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . This was the second game of a back - to back for the Jazz this week , as they 'll look to snap a three - game losing streak when they take on the New York Knicks on Thursday .

The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

The Houston Rockets defeated the New York Knicks , 116 - 111 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 7 - 10 ) came into Wednesday 's contest as a double - digit favorite , having won four of their last five games . They were led by James Harden 's 26 points , which he supplemented with nine assists , seven rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela was next with an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three steals and a block . Trevor Ariza and Dwight Howard turned in matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds , an assist and two steal , and the latter posting six rebounds and a pair of assists . Eric Gordon paced the bench with 18 points , four rebounds and an assist . Arron Afflalo 's 31 points paced the Knicks ( 8 - 10 , 4 - 8 ) , a total he complemented with seven boards , three assists and a steal . Kristaps Porzingis was right behind him with 20 points , 13 rebounds , two blocks , one assist , one steal and one block . Lance Thomas registered 15 points , three boards and one assist . Justin Holiday led the second unit with 14 points , seven boards and four assists . Jose Calderon and Robin Lopez combined for just seven points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal on 2 - of - 7 shooting . The Knicks shot a respectable 58 percent from the field , but struggled from beyond the arc , hitting just 33 percent of their attempts . Houston 's next game is at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Boston to take on the Celtics on Friday .

The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 16 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 13 ) 127 - 114 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 33 - 22 in the first quarter and 34 - 26 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Knicks were n't able to keep up with the Nuggets ' high - powered offense . Denver shot 56 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range , while holding the Knicks to 44 percent shooting from the floor and 35 percent from long range . Emmanuel Mudiay was the high - point man for the Nuggets , finishing with 22 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , to go along with seven rebounds and five assists , in 32 minutes . Gary Harris chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , two rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 30 minutes . Danilo Gallinari finished with 13 points and three assists , while Will Barton added 25 points and seven rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony , who went 10 - for - 14 from the free throw line and 2 - for 2 from three point range to score a game - high of 29 points , in 36 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis added 22 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 38 minutes . Brandon Jennings finished with 14 points , seven assists and three steals , while Justin Holiday Acy added 17 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 7 - 8 - 8 FT ) and nine rebounds in 28 minutes . Up next , the Knicks play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . Meanwhile , the Nuggets play host to the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , in what should be a fun matchup .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks 105 - 87 at American Airlines Arena on Friday . The Heat ( 27 - 21 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , Miami led for the entirety of the second and third quarters , as the Hawks never led by more than seven points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Heat recording 21 assists to just 18 turnovers , while the Hawks committed 17 turnovers to just 13 assists . Miami also dominated the shooting , as they went 48 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range , while Atlanta finished at 39 percent and just 23 percent from deep . The Hawks ( 26 - 22 ) have been playing some of their best basketball of the season recently , but this was one of their worst performances of the year . Al Horford was the only starter in double figures , as he tallied 17 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Paul Millsap finished second on the team , totaling 17 points and five rebounds . Jeff Teague accrued 15 points , six assists and two steals . Kent Bazemore got the start at center and amassed eight points , 10 rebounds and one assist . Dennis Schroder was a nice spark off the bench , providing 11 points , three assists and three steals . On deck for the Hawks is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Sunday . Miami was led by Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade , who each scored 18 points a piece . Wade added eight assists and four rebounds , while Bosh grabbed seven rebounds and blocked two shots . Luol Deng and Amar'e Stoudemire also scored 17 and 13 points , respectively . Hassan Whiteside was the player of the game though , amassing 10 points and nine rebounds in the victory . The only other player to score in double digits for the Heat was Tyler Johnson , who dropped six points off of the bench . Miami will look to build off this win on Sunday , when they play the New York Knicks on the road .
The Washington Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 14 ) 103 - 91 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C. The Wizards were able to hold off the Magic in this one , as they held them to just nine points in the fourth quarter . The Wizards shot 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range , while the Magic shot just 47 percent and 25 percent from long range . The Magic were also out - rebounded 46 - 39 by the Wizards , which may have been the difference in the game . John Wall led the Wizards in scoring with 24 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 13 assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Otto Porter added 20 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 2 - 8 3PT ) and 11 rebounds , while Marcin Gortat chipped in 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and 14 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Bradley Beal was the only other Wizards player to score in double figures , as he finished with 13 points , five rebounds and four assists , in 28 minutes off the bench . Tobias Harris ( 13 ) and Nikola Vucevic ( 14 ) were the only two Magic players to reach double figures in points , as the rest of the starters combined to score just 20 points . Aaron Gordon was the high - point man for the Magic , with 20 ( 8 - 18 FG ) , along with five assists , four steals and four steals , in 31 minutes , while Evan Fournier added 11 points and three assists . Up next , the Wizards will look to keep their winning streak alive , when they host the Hornets on Friday , in their next game . Orlando , on the other hand , will head home to take on the Nets on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 17 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 20 ) 109 - 105 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Zach LaVine led the way for the Timberwolves with a game - high 40 points , as he shot 13 - for - 21 from the field , including 7 - of - 12 from three - point range , to go along with six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 39 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns followed up with 20 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 13 rebounds and five assists , in 38 minutes , while Andrew Wiggins chipped in 15 points ( 6 - 19 FG , 0 - 6 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and one assist , in 40 minutes . Ricky Rubio finished with 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) , eight assists , six rebounds and three steals , in 34 minutes . Gorgui Dieng finished with six points ( 3 - 5 FG ) and 10 rebounds , in 43 minutes . The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who finished with 32 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , four steals and two blocks , in 37 minutes . Rudy Gay was held out of the game with a sore left knee , while Omri Casspi played 31 minutes off the bench and finished with 17 points and three rebounds . The Timberwolves shot 46 percent from the floor and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while the Kings shot 53 percent ( 52 percent ) and 52 percent from long range , as they were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 42 - 34 . Next up , the Kings will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to back set . Meanwhile , the Timberwolves will stay home and play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 102 - 99 - 99 , in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Wizards ( 3 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run to get there . In fact , Washington outscored San Antonio , 36 - 26 , in the fourth quarter to pull out the win . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards hitting 48 percent of their shots from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Spurs went 46 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs ( 2 - 2 ) were led by Kawhi Leonard , who finished with 23 points and nine rebounds on 10 - of - 22 shooting . Tony Parker was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 17 points and four assists . LaMarcus Aldridge recorded a double - double , totaling 10 points and 15 rebounds . Tim Duncan had a quiet game by his standards , but still finished with eight points , 11 rebounds and five assists in 27 minutes . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards , scoring a game - high 25 points , to go along with five rebounds , four assists and three steals in 36 minutes . John Wall recorded a triple - double of his own , totaling 17 points , 13 assists , two rebounds and four steals in 35 minutes . Otto Porter , Jr. scored 19 points on 8 - of 10 shooting , while Marcin Gortat finished with 10 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block in 28 minutes . Up next , the Wizards will look to extend their winning streak to five games , as they play the second game of a back - to back series in Atlanta on Friday . San Antonio will look for their third straight win when they take on the road for Game 4 on Friday in Atlanta .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 16 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 40 ) 105 - 93 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 28 - 29 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Chris Paul , who finished with 27 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven assists and two steals in 31 minutes . He 's now averaging 27 points and 8 assists on the season . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with six points and 17 rebounds in 32 minutes . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench for the Clippers , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3PT ) , two rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks in 26 minutes . The Lakers were led in scoring by Julius Randle , who went 9 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - 1 from the three - point line to finish with 23 points , 14 rebounds and one assist in 35 minutes . Jordan Clarkson was the only other starter to score in double figures for the Lakers . He had 17 points and eight rebounds in 36 minutes , while Roy Hibbert added 12 points and five rebounds in 28 minutes . Lou Williams chipped in 11 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 7 - 10 FT ) and six rebounds , while Jordan Clarkson had eight points ( 3 - 10 FG ) and five assists in 25 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head home to take on the Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 14 - 3 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 5 - 10 ) 112 - 100 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C. The Spurs were able to pull away in the fourth quarter after trailing by double - digits for the majority of the game , as they outscored the Wizards 36 - 24 in the final period . The Spurs shot 53 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards shot 48 percent from beyond the arc and 27 percent from long range . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 24 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Tony Parker followed up with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) , three assists and one rebound , in 27 minutes . Kawhi Leonard finished with 19 points , five assists , one rebound and three steals , in 36 minutes , while Pau Gasol finished with eight points , 10 rebounds and two assists , in 29 minutes . Manu Ginobili chipped in 15 points and four rebounds , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Wizards were led by Bradley Beal , who finished with 25 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 3 - 9 3PT ) , six rebounds and five assists in 38 minutes . John Wall finished with 21 points , three rebounds and four assists , while Otto Porter , Jr. added 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Marcin Gortat recorded a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , along with 10 rebounds . Markieff Morris finished with 12 points , one assist , one steal and one block , in 18 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will head home Friday to take on the road to play the Pelicans , while Washington will head to New York to play against the Knicks on Friday . The Wiz will look to get back on track Friday , when they host the Knicks .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 48 - 19 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 34 - 34 ) 99 - 98 on Wednesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Mavericks 31 - 28 in the first quarter , but the Mavericks battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Cavaliers out - scored the Mavericks 27 - 17 in the final period to seal the win . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki , who finished with 20 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , four rebounds , three assists and three blocked shots in 35 minutes . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Dirk Nowtizki 's 20 points were also a season - high for the veteran , as he 's averaging 19 points per game over his last five outings . J.J. Barea was the only other Maverick to reach double figures in points , finishing with 20 ( 8 - 11 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and three rebounds in 22 minutes off the bench . Chandler Parsons recorded a double - double with six points ( 3 - 9 FG ) and 10 assists in 36 minutes , while also adding five rebounds and two steals . The only other player to score in double digits for the Mavericks was Devin Harris , who chipped in 17 points in 23 minutes . Kyrie Irving led all scorers with 33 points ( 13 - 28 FG , 3 - 10 3PT ) , to go along with five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 39 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 23 points and 18 rebounds , while J.R. Smith added 13 points , four assists , three steals and three steals in 40 minutes . Tristan Thompson was held scoreless in 37 minutes , but did add eight rebounds and three assists . The Cavs ' next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Friday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

The Denver Nuggets ( 31 - 42 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 15 - 57 ) 116 - 105 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Nuggets were able to pull away in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 33 - 28 to finish the game . They were led by Jamal Murray , who scored 20 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and grabbed eight rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on all of those attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him , as he had n't reached the 20 - point mark in his last three games , so it was good to see him get back on track . Gary Harris was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 13 points and two assists in 24 minutes . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 assists on the season . Nikola Jokic was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with eight points and 12 rebounds in 22 minutes . Kobe Bryant led the Lakers in scoring with 28 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 4 - 9 3PT ) , to go along with four rebounds and four assists in 29 minutes . Bryant 's 28 points marked a season - high in points for him . Jordan Clarkson had 20 points of his own , going 8 - 16 from the field and 4 - 7 from three - point range . Julius Randle recorded his first double - double of the season , finishing the game with a 13 - point and 18 - rebound line . He also recorded 10 assists and a blocked shot . The Lakers were missing D'Angelo Russell , who sat out with a soreness in his left knee . He played 12 minutes and finished with two points and one rebound . The only other Lakers player to score in double digits was Lou Williams , who chipped in 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 3 3PT , 4 x 4 FT ) in 30 minutes . With the loss , the Lakers have now lost four of their last five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . They 're currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division , and are just a half a game ahead of the eighth - seeded Portland Trail Blazers . They are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the West , so they 'll look to get back in the win column as soon as possible . Next up , the Nuggets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Lakers will go on the road and play the Golden State Warriors on Friday .

The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 29 - 14 in the first quarter , but the Pelicans battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Jazz were able to out - score the Pelicans 27 - 18 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Gordon Hayward led the Jazz in scoring with 23 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 16 rebounds , along with three assists , two steals and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Joe Ingles chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) with five rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . Dante Exum started at point guard in place of Derrick Favors , who sat out with an illness , and finished with eight points ( 3 - 11 FG ) , four rebounds and two assists , in 25 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 20 points ( 7 - 17 FG ) and 12 rebounds , in 37 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins added 15 points and eight rebounds , while Jrue Holiday finished with four points ( 1 - 9 FG , 11 assists ) , five rebounds and three blocked shots , in 23 minutes . Ryan Anderson Varets added 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG ) in 20 minutes off the bench , in his second game back from injury . The only other player to score in double figures for the Pelicans was E'Twaun Moore , who scored 10 points ( 2 - 8 FG ) with one rebound , in 18 minutes . Up next , the Pelicans will head home to take on the Mavericks on Friday , while the Jazz will head to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday . The Nuggets will also be in action Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 10 - 5 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 4 - 11 ) 104 - 99 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 20 - 20 in the first quarter , but the Sixers battled back to make it a two - point game heading into halftime . However , the Grizzlies were able to out - score the Sixers 23 - 15 in the third quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull away in the fourth quarter . Memphis was led by Marc Gasol , who finished with a game - high 27 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting from the field , including 2 - for - 5 from three - point range , along with four rebounds , four assists , three steals and three blocks , in 45 minutes . Mike Conley followed up with 25 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , nine rebounds and nine assists , while JaMychal Green added 10 points and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Zach Randolph chipped in 11 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) , six rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench . Ersan Ilyasova led the way for the Sixers with 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and 12 rebounds , while Robert Covington added 19 points ( 6 - 10 FG ) and 10 rebounds , three blocked shots , in 46 minutes . Joel Embiid finished with 12 points , 11 boards , three assists , one steal and one block , in 26 minutes , while Jahlil Okafor added 18 points and six assists , in 30 minutes . The Sixers shot just 38 percent from the floor and 33 percent from long range , while the Grizzlies shot 38 percent and 35 percent from beyond the arc , as they were unable to keep up with the Grizzlies ' big men . Up next , the Sixers will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks , while Memphis will head home to take on the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

Smith was the high - point man for the Cavaliers , with 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG ) and five three - pointers , in 27 minutes . The Jazz got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pelicans 32 - 25 in the first quarter and 37 - 16 in the second quarter . They never looked back after that , as they went on to win the remaining three quarters by at least 12 points . Utah shot 55 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pelicans to just 46 percent shooting from the floor and 21 percent from long range . Rudy Gobert was the high - point man for the Jazz , as he finished with 27 points ( 10 - 14 FG , 6 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds and one assist , in 24 minutes off the bench . He 's now averaging 16 points and 10 rebounds on the season . George Hill chipped in 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3PT , 5 - 8 FT ) of his own , while George Hill added three assists and one steal , in 25 minutes . Derrick Favors finished with 12 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , seven rebounds and two assists , while Joe Johnson added 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) and five rebounds , in 23 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Terrence Jones , who finished with 21 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and eight rebounds , along with one assist . It was a season - high in points for him , while also notching his first double - double of the year . Jrue Holiday finished with 15 points and six rebounds , while Anthony Davis added 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists and six blocks , in 30 minutes . Tyreke Evans came up with 13 points in 19 minutes , while E'Twaun Moore added 11 points ( 1 - 4 FG , 9 - 10 FT ) . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Ryan Anderson Varejao , who had 11 points and four assists off the pine , in just 24 minutes . Up next , the Jazz will head to Houston to take on the Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 115 - 109 - 109 , in Game 1 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Toyota Center . The Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this win . In fact , the Rockets led for the entirety of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . The key for Houston was the rebounding , as the Rockets snatched down 54 boards to the Clippers 40 . The Clippers ( 1 1 ) have been one of the worst rebounding teams in the NBA this season and that was evident in this game . Los Angeles shot 45 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range , while the Rockets shot 43 percent and 19 percent from long range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Houston recording 20 assists to 14 turnovers , while Los Angeles committed 20 turnovers to just 20 assists . Blake Griffin led the Clippers in scoring , as he dropped 34 points and 15 rebounds on 13 - of - 23 shooting . DeAndre Jordan was the only other Clipper in double figures , totaling 16 points and 12 rebounds . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 19 points , five rebounds and five assists . J.J. Redick and Austin Rivers each finished with 12 points and 10 points , respectively . James Harden was the player of the game , accumulating 32 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Dwight Howard recorded a 24 - point , 16 - rebound double - double to go along with three assists and four blocks . Trevor Ariza finished with 15 points , 13 rebounds and two assists . Terrence Jones and Jason Terry tied for second on the team in scoring with 10 points a piece . Houston will look to build off this win in Game 2 on Monday , when they host the Golden State Warriors .

The Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to battle for the top spot in the Eastern Conference playoff race . Chicago has now won three of its last four games , with Wednesday 's win over the Raptors being the most impressive of the bunch . They shot 53 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range , while holding the Raptors to 38 percent shooting overall and just 40 percent from long range . Chicago also dominated the rebounding battle , winning that battle , 47 - 36 , and outscoring Toronto by a 32 - 36 margin in the paint . Joakim Noah recorded a double - double with eight points and 14 assists , while Pau Gasol added 11 points , nine rebounds , six assists and a block . D'Angelo Russell struggled shooting , going 2 - for - 11 from the field , but still finished with 11 points , five rebounds and six assists in 28 minutes . Lou Williams was the high - point man for the Lakers , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3 Pt ) and six rebounds off the bench . Timofey Mozgov finished with 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and eight rebounds in 22 minutes . Jordan Clarkson was the only other Laker to reach double figures in points , as he finished with four points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , four rebounds , six assists , four steals and two blocks in 26 minutes . Next up , the Lakers will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Suns will travel to Portland to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 53 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 36 ) 104 - 94 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 29 - 22 in the first quarter and 29 - 13 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Kings were n't able to keep up with the fast paced Spurs offense . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs , scoring 25 points ( 9 - 24 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with 13 rebounds and six assists , in 36 minutes . He 's now averaging 25 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Manu Ginobili also had a big game off the bench , scoring 22 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and grabbing a team - high of 22 rebounds , in just 15 minutes . It was his second double - double - digit scoring game in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 12 rebounds over those two games . The only other Spurs player to reach double figures in points was Boris Diaw , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) , along with six assists and two blocks , in 30 minutes . For the Kings , DeMarcus Cousins did everything he could to keep the Kings in this game . He went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - 3 from the three - point line to score 31 points , while also adding nine rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Cousins has been on fire lately , averaging 27 points and 11 rebounds over his last five games . Rajon Rondo struggled shooting the ball , going just 4 - of - 9 for nine points , but still finished with nine assists , one rebound and two steals , in 34 minutes . Quincy Acy had 16 points ( 7 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 3PT ) , seven rebounds and one assist , in 31 minutes . Up next , the Spurs will stay home to take on the Clippers on Friday , while the Kings will head home to play the Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been struggling mightily this season , but they showed some serious resiliency in this blowout win . In fact , Philadelphia outscored Phoenix , 34 - 30 , in the fourth quarter to seal the victory . The key for the Sixers was their defense , as they held the Suns to 42 percent shooting from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Sixers recording 33 assists to 18 turnovers , while the Suns committed 18 turnovers to just 18 assists . The Suns ( 4 - 9 ) had to play this game without Devin Booker , Eric Bledsoe , Alex Len and Marquese Chriss and they simply did n't have enough in the tank to keep up with the 76ers . Booker finished with just 10 points on 4 - of - 13 shooting , while Len had nine points , seven rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Chriss had six points , two rebounds and an assist in 20 minutes . Alan Williams was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 12 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Phoenix will look to play better on Friday in a road matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers . The 76ers were led by Joel Embiid , who scored a game - high 26 points , to go along with seven rebounds and two blocks . Dario Saric was second on the team in scoring , dropping 21 points on 8 - for - 9 shooting off the pine . Sergio Rodriguez recorded a double - double , totaling eight points , eight rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Ersan Ilyasova started in place of Nerlens Noel and finished with 11 points and two rebounds . Gerald Henderson and Nik Stauskas each scored 11 points as well . Philadelphia 's next game will be on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks .

They then went on to out - score the Timberwolves 37 - 17 in the second quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a comfortable victory . They shot 60 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while the Timberwolves shot 46 percent from deep and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who went 13 - 22 from the floor and 1 - 5 from deep to score a game - high of 36 points , along with eight rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 29 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) of his own , while adding four rebounds and three steals . Ricky Rubio finished with a double - double , with 15 points and 12 assists . Gorgui Dieng played 34 minutes and finished with eight points and eight rebounds , while Zach LaVoy Allen was the only other Timberwolve to play more than 12 minutes , as he finished with five points and two rebounds . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday . Meanwhile , the Timberwolves host the Portland Trail Blazers on Saturday .

Brandon Knight led the way for the Suns . He went 8 - for - 16 from the floor to score a team - high of 21 points , while adding six rebounds and six steals in 39 minutes . Alex Len finished with 20 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 6 - 11 FT ) of his own , along with 14 rebounds , three blocked shots and one assist , in 36 minutes . Eric Bledsoe added 21 points and nine assists , while Jon Leuer and P.J . Tucker finished with 15 and 11 points , respectively , in 27 and 32 minutes , respectively . Derrick Rose was the high - point man for the Bulls , finishing with 18 points ( 8 - 22 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five assists , one rebound and one steal , in 32 minutes . Nikola Mirotic added 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , nine rebounds and one assist , in 25 minutes , while Jimmy Butler chipped in 17 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Tony Snell added 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) and two rebounds , in 29 minutes . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who finished with 25 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes . Kevin Love added 18 points , eight rebounds and four assists , in 35 minutes . Mo Williams finished with 19 points , seven assists and four rebounds , while Tristan Thompson added 10 points off the bench , in 17 minutes . Up next , the Bulls will head home to take on the 76ers on Tuesday , while the Cavaliers will head to Detroit to play the Pistons on Tuesday . Game 2 will take place in Detroit .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 28 - 23 ) 108 - 87 on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 27 - 15 in the first quarter and 42 - 22 in the second quarter . The Suns were n't able to keep up with the Blazers in the third quarter , as they were out - scored 30 - 22 , allowing the Blazers to run away with the game in the fourth quarter . Nicolas Batum was the high - point man for the Trail Blazers , finishing with 20 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , along with seven assists and four rebounds , in 36 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge finished with 19 points ( 7 - 18 FG ) and 13 rebounds , while Robin Lopez chipped in 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and four blocks , in 31 minutes . Damian Lillard struggled shooting the ball , going 6 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - 5 from the three - point line , but still finished with 13 points , four rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . The Blazers shot 44 percent from the floor and 26 percent from beyond the arc , while holding the Suns to just 39 percent shooting . Markieff Morris and Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Suns , with 18 points and 17 points , respectively . Morris also added eight rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Goran Dragic finished with nine points ( 4 - 11 FG ) , five assists and three rebounds , but no other than that , as he shot just 4 - of - 11 ( 1 - 3 3PT ) . The only other player to score in double digits for Phoenix was Alex Len , who finished with five points ( 2 - 3 FG ) in nine minutes . Up next , the Suns will head home to take on the Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Blazers will head to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Wednesday . The Spurs will also be in San Antonio , where they 'll be taking on the road against the Spurs .

The Charlotte Hornets ( 5 - 15 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 4 - 17 ) 103 - 102 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 31 - 21 in the first quarter and holding them to just 21 points the rest of the way . The Knicks were able to make a run in the fourth quarter , but it was n't enough , as the Hornets held them to 18 points in the final 12 minutes to secure the victory . The key for Charlotte was their defense , as they held the Knicks to 47 percent shooting from the field and 46 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Hornets recording 19 assists to just seven turnovers , while the Knicks committed six turnovers to just six assists . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for Charlotte , as it was their third straight win . Gerald Henderson led the way for the Hornets , as he tallied 22 points ( 8 - 10 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and two assists in 31 minutes . Lance Stephenson was the only other starter in double figures , finishing with 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG ) , six rebounds and six assists in 38 minutes . Al Jefferson recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and 13 rebounds in 34 minutes . Kemba Walker struggled shooting the ball , going 4 - for - 15 from the floor , but still finished with 11 points , four rebounds and four assists in 39 minutes . Charlotte will look to build off this win when they host the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday . Carmelo Anthony led the Knicks with 32 points ( 11 - 22 FG ) and seven rebounds in 42 minutes , while also adding four assists and four steals . The only other player to score in double digits for New York was rookie Langston Galloway , who finished with 14 points and five assists in 30 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Knicks will head home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while Charlotte will stay home and play the Miami Heat on Friday as well .

Next up , the Rockets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , in the second game of a back - to back , while Oklahoma City will travel to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday .

The Golden State Warriors ( 54 - 13 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 53 - 15 ) 114 - 95 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 28 - 24 in the first quarter and 31 - 17 in the second quarter . They never looked back after that , as they went on to win the remaining three quarters by at least 12 points each . Golden State shot 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while holding the Hawks to 36 percent shooting from the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . Harrison Barnes led the Warriors in scoring with 25 points ( 11 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes . Draymond Green followed up with 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 7 3PT ) , seven rebounds and three assists , in 29 minutes , while Andre Iguodala chipped in 21 points ( 9 - 12 FG ) , six assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 27 minutes off the bench . Stephen Curry finished with 16 points and 12 assists , while Andrew Bogut recorded a double - double with 14 points ( 0 - 3 FG ) and 14 rebounds , along with three blocked shots , in 22 minutes . The Hawks were led by Paul Millsap and DeMarre Carroll , who finished with a pair of 16 - point efforts , with Millsap adding nine rebounds , three assists and two steals , and Carroll adding 12 rebounds and two blocks , in 33 minutes . Jeff Teague chipping in 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 4 - 6 FT ) and three steals , in 23 minutes . Next up for the Warriors is a matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to - back , in which the Warriors will look to extend their winning streak to 10 games . Atlanta , on the other hand , has now lost four of their last five games , including three in a row . They 'll look to get back on track on Friday when they host the New Orleans Pelicans for their next game .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 98 - 87 , in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Air Canada Centre . The Raptors ( 1 - 1 ) were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . In fact , Toronto held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half , as they held the Pacers to just 16 points in the third quarter and outscored them , 61 - 36 , in the fourth quarter . The key for the Raptors was their defense , as Indiana was held to just 41 percent shooting from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . They also forced the Pacers into 13 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . Toronto also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 44 - 33 . Paul George led the way for the Pacers , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and one assist . Monta Ellis finished with 15 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . The only other player to score in double digits for Indiana was Ian Mahinmi , who totaled five points and five rebounds in 22 minutes . Kyle Lowry and Jonas Valanciunas carried the load for Toronto , as Lowry accumulated 18 points , seven rebounds , nine assists and seven steals , to go along with one steal and one block , in 40 minutes , while Valancunas finished with 23 points , 15 rebounds , two blocks and one steal . DeMar DeRozan struggled shooting , going just 5 - of - 18 from the floor , finishing with 10 points . Cory Joseph Joseph led the bench with 16 points and three assists in 24 minutes . Game 2 will take place on Monday at Bankers Life Time Arena .
The Houston Rockets ( 49 - 22 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 33 - 37 ) 125 - 124 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 35 - 28 in the first quarter and 32 - 27 in the second quarter , but the Nuggets battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Rockets were able to out - score the Nuggets 31 - 27 over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 39 points ( 13 - 29 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , 11 assists , seven rebounds and four steals in 40 minutes . He also had six turnovers , but was able to get to the free throw line 11 times , converting on nine of those attempts . Trevor Ariza had 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 7 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds in 41 minutes , while Patrick Beverley added 14 points , six rebounds and three assists in 32 minutes . Eric Gordon chipped in 18 points ( 4 - 7 from long range ) , three assists , one rebound and one blocked shot in 31 minutes off the bench , while Clint Capela added 12 points ( 6 - 8 FG ) , nine rebounds , four assists and one block in 27 minutes . The Nuggets were led by Gary Harris , who finished with 28 points ( 10 - 16 FG ) and three steals in 39 minutes . Nikola Jokic finished with 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , 13 rebounds and eight assists , while Jamal Murray Hillis Plumlee had four points ( 2 - 5 FG ) in 24 minutes . Jamal Murray was the only other Nugget to score in double figures , finishing with 24 points ( 8 - 13 FG ) to go with seven rebounds , eight assists and seven steals in 30 minutes . Up next , the Nuggets will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Rockets will go on the road to Memphis to play the Grizzlies on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Toronto Raptors , 98 - 76 - 98 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 37 - 18 ) have now won four of their last five games , as they continue to climb up the Western Conference standings . James Harden led the way for Houston , scoring 20 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , to go along with seven assists , five rebounds and two steals , in 29 minutes . Eric Gordon added 26 points and 10 rebounds , in 35 minutes off the bench , while Donatas Motiejunas chipped in 12 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks , in 31 minutes . Trevor Ariza started in place of Eric Gordon and finished with nine points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 28 minutes . Patrick Beverley struggled with his shot , going 1 - for - 8 from the field , but finished with four steals and four assists , in 25 minutes . James Johnson led all scorers for the Rockets , with 27 points on 10 - of 16 shooting , along with five rebounds , four steals , four blocks and four blocked shots , in 34 minutes . Terrence Jones added 11 points , nine rebounds , three blocked shots and one assist , in 24 minutes . For the Raptors , the loss snapped a three - game winning streak , and they 've now lost three straight games . DeMar DeRozan finished with 10 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Jonas Valanciunas had 11 points and seven rebounds . The Raptors shot 33 percent from the floor and 22 percent from three - point range , as a team . Up next , the Rockets will head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday . Toronto will look to end their losing streak on Friday against the Spurs .
The Sacramento Kings ( 24 - 31 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 22 - 35 ) 114 - 110 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Kings with a game - high 39 points ( 14 - 24 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 9 - 12 FT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , two assists , one steal and two blocks , in 36 minutes . Rudy Gay followed up with 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 3 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds , while Rajon Rondo chipped in four points ( 2 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , 12 assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 31 minutes . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc , while the Nuggets shot 41 percent and 37 percent , respectively . The Nuggets were led by Danilo Gallinari , who finished with 17 points ( 5 - 14 FG ) and one assist , in 37 minutes . Nikola Jokic added 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) , 13 rebounds , six assists , two steals and two steals , in 20 minutes . Will Barton came up big in 27 minutes off the bench , as he finished with 18 points , six rebounds and four assists , in 26 minutes . Kenneth Faried finished with 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block , in 22 minutes , while Emmanuel Mudiay added 11 points , four assists and one rebound , in 25 minutes . On deck for the Nuggets is a home matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . For the Kings , it was their second game in as many nights , as they play host to the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 38 - 36 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 22 - 53 ) 95 - 91 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 27 - 12 in the first quarter , but the Suns battled back to make it a one - point game heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Hawks were able to out - score the Suns 24 - 23 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Suns were led by T.J. Warren , who finished with 24 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks , in 40 minutes . Tyler Ulis added 15 points and 10 assists , while Alex Len chipped in 12 points , seven rebounds and three steals , in 25 minutes . Dennis Schroder led the Hawks in scoring with 27 points ( 12 - 27 FG ) , to go along with six rebounds and nine assists , in 39 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova finished with 18 points ( 6 - 15 FG ) and 12 rebounds , in 33 minutes , while Dwight Howard added a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double , along with four assists , four blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . Taurean Prince finished with 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) and six rebounds , while Tim Hardaway Jr. went just 1 - for - 9 from the field to score two points , in 32 minutes . With this win the Hawks are now tied with the Hornets for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference playoff picture . Next up the Hawks will travel to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Friday , while the Suns will head home to play the Nets on Friday . This marks the Suns ' fourth loss in five games , as they continue to slide down the standings . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak , as the Suns are now just a half game ahead of the eighth place Nets . Next the Suns play the second game of their current five - game road trip , when they host the Pacers on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 17 - 11 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 15 - 10 ) 108 - 94 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . The Heat were expected to win this game easily , but the Raptors had other ideas . In fact , they led for over 40 minutes of this game , as this was a wire - to - wire win for the Raptors . Shooting was the difference in the game , with Toronto shooting 51 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range , while the Heat shot 47 percent from deep . The Raptors also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 38 - 34 . DeMar DeRozan carried the load for Toronto , as he tallied 30 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry was n't far behind , finishing with 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and four assists of his own . Luis Scola was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 20 points ( 9 - 16 FG ) , three rebounds and one assist . Bismack Biyombo recorded a double - double , totaling five points ( 2 - 5 FG ) and 15 rebounds , while adding one block and one steal in 34 minutes of action . The only other player to score in double digits for Toronto was Terrence Ross , who finished with 17 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 5 - 8 3PT ) , one rebound , one assist , one steal and two blocks in 25 minutes off the bench . Dwyane Wade led the Heat in scoring , totaling 21 points , six rebounds and five assists . Goran Dragic finished second on the team with 18 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Hassan Whiteside recorded eight points ( 4 - 6 FG ) but did haul in 13 rebounds and recorded five blocks in 31 minutes . James Johnson and James Johnson each scored 13 points , with the former adding five assists and one rebound and the latter dishing out one assist and recording one steal . Wayne Ellington led the bench with 20 points , one of his best games of the season . Miami will look to get out of this slide on Friday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game . Toronto will be right back in action on Saturday , as they travel to Orlando to play the Magic .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 18 - 12 ) 114 - 106 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 29 - 20 in the first quarter and 38 - 29 in the second quarter . The Spurs were able to make a run late in the fourth quarter , but the Thunder were n't done yet , as they out - scored the Spurs 38 - 28 in the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The two teams combined to shoot 52 percent from the field and 60 percent from three - point range , but it was the Thunder who did most of the damage in this game . They out - rebounded the Spurs 47 - 38 and out - assisted them 33 - 38 . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder , as he tallied 34 points , 11 assists , five rebounds and five steals . Serge Ibaka was second on the team , finishing with 21 points and nine rebounds . Steven Adams recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and 15 rebounds . The only other player to score in double figures for Oklahoma City was Perry Jones , who finished with 14 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting . The loss snapped a three - game winning streak for the Spurs , but they did get some great performances off the bench . Manu Ginobili led the team with 17 points , four rebounds and one assist in 32 minutes . Tim Duncan finished with 15 points , six rebounds , five assists and one block in 29 minutes . Patty Mills chipped in with 11 points , seven rebounds and 13 assists in 25 minutes . The bench was huge for San Antonio , as David Lee Davis , Marco Belinelli and Boris Diaw combined to score 29 points and grab 10 rebounds . Up next , the Thunder will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Spurs will stay home and play the Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 38 - 6 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 18 - 28 ) 118 - 98 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 22 in the first quarter and 42 - 24 in the second quarter . The Magic were able to make a run in the third quarter , but it was n't enough , as Golden State was able to hold on to the lead for the rest of the game . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors , scoring 27 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 7 - 13 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with six assists and four rebounds , in 30 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 21 points ( 7 - 14 FG ) , five rebounds and one assist , in 34 minutes . Kevin Durant finished with 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) and 10 rebounds , while Draymond Green chipped in six points ( 1 - 7 FG , 0 - 4 3PT ) , 10 rebounds and four assists , in 33 minutes . Zaza Pachulia was the only other Warrior to score in double figures , as he finished with 14 points , in 20 minutes . On deck for Golden State is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday . For the Magic , Elfrid Payton had a nice game , with a team - high of 23 points ( 11 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 3PT , 0 for 2Pt ) , along with 10 assists , four rebounds and a steal , in 39 minutes . Nikola Vucevic had 12 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 2 - 7 - 7 FT ) and 13 rebounds in 24 minutes , while C.J . Watson and Serge Ibaka finished with 12 points each , with the former adding four assists and two rebounds , and the latter adding three rebounds , one assist and one block , in 21 minutes . Aaron Gordon struggled shooting , going 4 - 14 from the field and 0 - for 6 from the three - point line , but still finished with eight points , five assists , three rebounds and three steals . Orlando will look to bounce back in their next game on Friday , when they play host to the New York Knicks .

The Thunder were able to pull away in the second quarter and never looked back , as they outscored the Warriors 38 - 19 in the third quarter and 45 - 16 in the fourth quarter .
