The Houston Rockets ( 42 - 18 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 23 - 36 ) 142 - 130 on Wednesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 35 - 28 in the first quarter , but the Timberwolves battled back in the second quarter to make it a two - point game . However , the Rockets were able to out - score the Timberwolves 40 - 30 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to pull away in the fourth quarter and win by a score of 42 - 36 . The Timberwolves were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who recorded a game - high of 37 points ( 16 - 24 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with 22 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 37 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 30 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) of his own , while Gorgui Dieng added 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) and 13 rebounds , in 36 minutes . Ricky Rubio chipped in with 14 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 2 - 5 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and 11 assists , in 32 minutes . James Harden finished with 24 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 5 - 11 3 Pt ) and 10 assists , along with five rebounds and two steals , in 35 minutes . Ryan Anderson was the only other Houston player to score in double figures , as he finished with 18 points , while Clint Capela finished with 16 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 22 minutes . Patrick Beverley finished with 15 points , seven assists , four rebounds and three steals , while Trevor Ariza added 15 points and three assists . Eric Gordon came up big off the bench , with 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG ) , four assists , three steals and two rebounds , and four turnovers , in 26 minutes . The Wolves shot 52 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Rockets shot 47 percent from deep and 38 percent from long range . Next , the Timberwolves will head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Friday , in what will be the second half of a back - to back for both teams . The Houston Rockets will be right back in action Friday , when they host the Spurs . The Spurs have won two straight and three of their last four , as they look to keep their playoff hopes alive .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 17 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 19 ) 98 - 86 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 33 - 22 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 23 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , 11 rebounds and two blocked shots in 37 minutes . He 's now averaging 23 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Wesley Matthews also had a nice game , finishing with 19 points and five rebounds in 35 minutes . Damian Lillard struggled shooting , going 6 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 5 from the three - point line , but still finished with 14 points , five rebounds and seven assists . He did have two turnovers though , so it was n't all good for the point guard . The Pistons were led in scoring by Tobias Harris , who had 22 points ( 10 - 22 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 33 minutes off the bench . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 12 rebounds per game . Andre Drummond had a solid game as well , recording 10 points and 15 rebounds in 30 minutes . The only other Piston to reach double figures in points was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who chipped in 11 points in 25 minutes . Brandon Jennings was the only other starter to score in double figures , as he finished with one point ( 0 - 5 FG , 0 - 2Pt ) and six assists in 20 minutes of action . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 24 - 41 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 33 ) 98 - 91 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 19 - 19 in the first quarter and 34 - 14 in the second quarter . They were able to hold the lead for the rest of the game , as the Bulls were n't able to make a run in the fourth quarter . The Bulls were led by Jimmy Butler , who finished with 21 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , nine assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games , where he 's averaging 24 points , 9 assists , 4 rebounds and 2 steals . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bulls was Jerian Grant , who chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG ) , five rebounds and two assists , in 24 minutes . Nikola Mirotic came off the bench to score 11 points and grab two rebounds , in 12 minutes , while Doug McDermott added eight points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) , six assists and five rebounds in 28 minutes as a reserve as well . With Dwyane Wade sitting this one out with an ankle injury , Elfrid Payton had to carry the load for the Magic , as he finished with 22 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 6 - 7 FT ) and 14 assists , 14 rebounds , two steals and two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Evan Fournier added 20 points and nine rebounds , while Terrence Ross finished with 14 points and three rebounds . Aaron Gordon and Bismack Biyombo were the only other Magic players in double figures , with 13 and six points respectively , in 29 and 31 minutes , respectively . Nikola Vucevic was held out of this game with an illness , but he 'll return to action as soon as he can , in the Magic 's next game on Friday against the New Orleans Pelicans . Meanwhile , the Bulls will look to get their first win of the season when they take on the Houston Rockets on Friday , in their next game .

The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint , as they held the Spurs to just 48 percent shooting from the field and 42 percent from three - point range . McCollum did all they could to keep the Spurs in this game , as Lillard finished with 36 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) and four assists , while McColum finished with 26 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 3PT , 8 - 8 FT ) , four assists and four rebounds . The Spurs were led by Kawhi Leonard , who finished with 34 points and nine rebounds . He also had six assists , three steals and two blocks , in 37 minutes . The Knicks were able to hold off the Rockets in this one , as they out - scored the Rockets 34 - 24 in the fourth quarter to secure the victory . The Rockets were able , however , to out - rebound the Knicks 42 - 45 , giving them just enough of an advantage to get the win . Kristaps Porzingis led the Knicks in scoring , as he tallied 24 points and 14 rebounds , while also adding two assists and seven blocks . He 's now averaging 16 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Carmelo Anthony struggled shooting the ball , going 5 - for - 10 from the field , but still finished with 14 points and six rebounds . Jose Calderon recorded 11 points and seven assists , giving him his third double - double in the last four games . Harden finished with 24 points ( 8 for 20 FG , 3 for 4 3PT , 5 - 5 FT ) and 10 assists , but he did turn the ball over three times . The Los Angeles Clippers ( 37 - 25 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 31 ) 101 - 91 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 29 - 29 in the first quarter and 32 - 12 in the second quarter . They were able to hold on to that lead for the rest of the game , as the Bulls were n't able to keep up with them in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in this game , with the Clippers recording 20 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Bulls committed 19 turnovers to just 26 assists . Chris Paul led the Clippers in scoring , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , four assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , in 33 minutes . Jamal Crawford was huge off the bench , as he scored 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) , to go along with two rebounds and two assists , in 26 minutes . Blake Griffin finished with 16 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 3 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and six rebounds , along with seven assists and six steals , in 34 minutes . J.J. Redick chipped in 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) and one rebound , in 24 minutes . The only other Clipper to score in double figures was Luc Mbah a Moute , who finished with 12 points and three rebounds , in 30 minutes . Jimmy Butler and Dwyane Wade were the only two Bulls players to reach double figures , as they each finished with 10 points ( 4 - 7 - 8 FT ) . Butler added six assists , four rebounds and three steals , while Wade added six rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . Bobby Portis and Robin Lopez finished with 11 points and 12 points , respectively . The Bulls shot just 42 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while also committing 19 turnovers in the loss . Next up , the Clippers will head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Friday , in what will be the second of a back - to back for the Clippers , in order to try and get back into the win column . Meanwhile , the Bulls will look to get back on track on Friday in a home matchup against the Nuggets .

The Cavaliers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Pistons 44 - 26 in the first quarter and 30 - 22 in the second quarter . They were able to coast to a comfortable lead for the rest of the game , as the Pistons were n't able to keep up . The Cavs shot 60 percent from the field and 63 percent from beyond the arc , while holding the Pistons to 37 percent shooting and 21 percent from three - point range . Kyrie Irving was the high - point man for the Cavaliers , finishing with 26 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt ) , to go along with six assists and one rebound , in 30 minutes . Iman Shumpert added 18 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3PT ) and five rebounds , in 36 minutes . LeBron James recorded a double - double with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3 Pt ) and 12 assists , along with 11 rebounds and one steal , in 28 minutes . Richard Jefferson was the only other Cavalier to score in double figures , as he chipped in 16 points , while also adding two rebounds , one assist and two steals , in 26 minutes . The Pistons were led by Tobias Harris and Marcus Morris , who each finished with 17 points and seven rebounds , respectively . Andre Drummond finished with eight points and 14 rebounds , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 11 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) and three assists , in 27 minutes . Jon Leuer was a nice spark off the bench for Detroit , with 12 points , in 21 minutes . Up next , the Cavaliers will head home to take on the Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Pistons will head to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .

Tobias Harris and Ersan Ilyasova each added 10 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals , in 28 minutes , while Jon Leuer led the bench with 17 points , six assists , one rebound and one steal , in 18 minutes . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Magic with 18 points , along with seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Nikola Vucevic followed up with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Tobias Harris added 11 points and three boards , in 33 minutes . The Magic shot 44 percent from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc , but they were out - rebounded 54 - 30 and out - scored in points in the paint 54 - 34 . Next up , the Pistons will head to Cleveland to take on the Cavaliers on Sunday , while the Magic will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Saturday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Sacramento Kings , 102 - 94 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . The Kings ( 2 - 4 ) were expected to win this game easily , but the Magic ( 2 3 ) had other ideas . Orlando outscored Sacramento 33 - 16 in the fourth quarter to pull away and secure the victory . The key for the Magic was their defense , as they held the Kings to 48 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The Magic also forced 14 turnovers from the Kings , while committing just 14 of their own . Sacramento was led by DeMarcus Cousins , as he tallied 33 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Rudy Gay and Ty Lawson were the only other Kings to score in double figures , with Gay finishing with 16 points and Lawson with 11 points and seven rebounds . Darren Collison led the bench with 12 points , five rebounds and one steal . Evan Fournier was the player of the game , scoring a game - high 29 points on 10 - of 15 shooting , including 3 - of - 7 from long range and 6 - of 7 from the free throw line . Serge Ibaka finished with 17 points and three rebounds . Aaron Gordon recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Elfrid Payton was the only Magic starter to score less than 10 points , but accrued six points , three rebounds and 11 assists . Nikola Vucevic recorded 10 points and nine rebounds , while Jeff Green led the second unit with 15 points in 19 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Magic will look to extend their win streak to five games on Friday , when they take on the road against the Miami Heat . Meanwhile , the Kings will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

He went 7 - for 14 from the field and 5 - 10 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding six rebounds and three assists in 42 minutes . The only other Blazer to reach double figures in points was C.J . McCollum , who scored 13 points in 23 minutes off the bench . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 115 - 107 , at Moda Center on Wednesday . The Hawks ( 25 - 8 ) came into Wednesday 's contest as a double - digit favorite , but the Trail Blazers ( 26 - 7 ) were able to make a run in the fourth quarter , out - scoring the visitors by a 32 - 32 margin . Atlanta was led by Paul Millsap 's 27 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , a steal and a block . Jeff Teague followed with 22 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Kyle Korver and Al Horford supplied matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds , an assist and a steal , and the latter supplying five rebounds , four assists and a blocked shot . DeMarre Carroll registered a near double - double with 11 points , nine rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Mike Muscala paced the second unit with a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double that also included three assists . LaMarcus Aldridge 's 30 points paced the Blazers , a total he complemented with 12 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Damian Lillard was next with 16 points , eight boards , seven assists , one block and one turnover . Nicolas Batum and Wesley Matthews were next with matching 16 - point tallies . Matthews added three assists and one rebound , while Batum registered four boards , three dimes , three steals and two blocks . Meyers Leonard Leonard paced the Portland bench with 10 points . The Trail Blazers shot 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc . Atlanta remains in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well ahead of the eighth - seeded Portland Blazers . They head to Los Angeles to take on the Lakers on Friday night . Portland remains in third place , and remains home for a Friday night showdown with the Grizzlies .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New York Knicks , 95 - 93 , at Spectrum Center on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 4 - 4 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they did n't disappoint . In fact , they pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they led for the final 40 - plus minutes . The key for Charlotte was their defense , as the Knicks shot just 49 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 52 - 33 . The Knicks ( 4- 5 ) had to play this game without Kristaps Porzingis and Joakim Noah and it clearly hurt them . Carmelo Anthony did all he could though , as he tallied 29 points , six rebounds and four assists in the defeat . Jose Calderon was the only other starter in double figures , accumulating 13 points , two rebounds and five assists . The only other player to score in double digits for New York was Arron Afflalo , who finished with 12 points and six rebounds . The loss snapped a three - game win streak for the Knicks and they 'll look to get back on track on Friday in a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers . Charlotte was led by Nicolas Batum , who accumulated 24 points , five rebounds and one assist . Frank Kaminsky III was huge off the bench , providing 17 points , three assists and three steals . Marco Belinelli was huge as well , amassing 14 points , four rebounds and two steals . Kemba Walker struggled with his shot , going just 2 - of - 11 from the floor and finishing with nine points and three assists . Up next for the Hornets is a matchup with the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .

The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 29 - 25 in the first quarter and 34 - 22 in the second quarter . The Raptors were able to make a run in the third quarter , but Golden State was able to hold them to just 27 points over the final 12 minutes . Golden State shot 54 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc , while holding the Raptors to 47 percent shooting and 33 percent from three - point range . Up next , the Warriors will look to extend their winning streak to 10 games on Friday against the Clippers , while the Raptors will head home Friday to take on the Nuggets .

Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , as he tallied 23 points ( 9 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3PT ) , five rebounds and five steals , in 26 minutes . Rodney McGruder was the only other Heat player in double figures , with 13 points , in 23 minutes . The Hawks were led by Paul Millsap , who finished with 21 points and four rebounds , along with one assist and one steal , in 28 minutes . Tim Hardaway , Jr. added 11 points ( 3 - 13 FG ) and two rebounds , while Kent Bazemore chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG ) . The only two other players scored in double digits for Atlanta , as the rest of the starters combined to go a combined 7 - for - 28 from the floor . The bench was led by eight points ( 2 - 2 FG , 1 - 1 3Pst , 3 3Pts ) from Dennis Schroder , in 16 minutes . Next up for the Hawks is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday , in which they 'll look to keep their playoff hopes alive . Miami , on the other hand , will look to extend their winning streak to four games as they play host to the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 32 - 35 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) 129 - 101 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 35 - 23 in the first quarter and 32 - 20 in the second quarter . They never looked back after that , as they went on to win the second and third quarters by at least 12 points in each of the remaining three quarters . The shooting was spectacular , as the Nuggets shot 54 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while the Lakers shot just 43 percent and 30 percent , respectively . The Lakers were led by Ivica Zubac , who recorded a double - double with 25 points ( 12 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds , in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson followed up with 19 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , three assists and two rebounds , while Brandon Ingram chipped in 14 points and two assists , in 27 minutes . Julius Randle struggled shooting , going 3 - for - 8 from the floor and 1 - for 2 from the free throw line to finish with seven points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block , in 24 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Lakers was Brandon Ingram , who finished with 10 points , in 28 minutes . Nikola Jokic was the high - point man for the Nuggets , with 18 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3PT ) , to go along with nine rebounds , four assists , one steal and one steal , in 23 minutes . Danilo Gallinari was the only other Nugget in double figures , as he finished with 18 ( 5 - 10 FG ) , five assists and three rebounds . Mason Plumlee finished with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with two blocked shots , in 36 minutes . Wilson Chandler was huge off the bench , with 22 points ( 4 - 6 3PT , 4 - 5 FT ) six assists , two rebounds and one blocked shot , in 29 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic finished with 13 points ( 3 - 5 FG ) in 19 minutes , while Jamal Murray added 13 points and six rebounds . Will Barton was the fourth Nugget to reach double figures in points , with a bench - leading 22 points , while Jameer Nelson struggled with his shot , going 2 - of 5 for five points , but did add six assists and four rebounds . Next up , the Nuggets play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Golden State Warriors on Friday , in what will be the second of a home - and - home set . Meanwhile , the Lakers will travel to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 20 - 54 ) 121 - 116 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 40 - 37 in the first quarter , but the Suns battled back to make it a one - point game heading into halftime . However , the Timberwolves were able to out - score the Suns 33 - 23 in the third quarter , giving them just enough of an advantage to pull away in the fourth quarter . They were led by Andrew Wiggins , who finished with a game - high of 32 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 17 - 21 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , three blocks and two assists , in 36 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns followed up with 27 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) and 10 rebounds , in 38 minutes , while Ricky Rubio chipped in 17 points , 11 assists , seven rebounds and three steals , in 34 minutes . Zach LaVine finished with 15 points , while Gorgui Dieng added 11 points ( 5 - 7 FG ) and nine rebounds in 30 minutes . The Wolves shot 51 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc , while the Suns shot 49 percent , but were out - rebounded 41 - 36 . Brandon Knight led the way for the Suns , with 30 points , five assists , two rebounds and one block , in 32 minutes . Devin Booker was the only other than Knight to score in double digits , as he went 10 - for - 22 from the floor , including 7 - for 11 points , in 43 minutes . Alex Len finished with 14 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) , 13 rebounds , one assist , three steals and one blocked shot , in 37 minutes . Mirza Teletovic added 19 points in 26 minutes off the bench , while Alex Len added 12 points , four blocks and one steal , in 21 minutes . Next up , the Suns play the second game of a back - to - back , when they host the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . The T-Wolves host the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , in what will be the second of a four - game road trip .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 10 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 112 - 94 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Pelicans 43 - 18 in the first quarter alone . They were able to hold the Pelicans to 40 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while also out - rebounding them 51 - 39 . C.J . McCollum led the way for the Trail Blazers , scoring a game - high 37 points ( 14 - 22 FG , 6 - 9 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and one assist , in 37 minutes . Damian Lillard added 21 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 1 - 7 3PT , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 assists , in 36 minutes . Meyers Leonard chipped in 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG ) , eight rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 34 minutes , while Allen Crabbe added 12 points and 11 rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans were led by Anthony Davis , who finished with 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) and 10 rebounds , along with two steals , two blocked shots and two blocks , in 41 minutes . Eric Gordon added 20 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 1 3PT ) , two rebounds and three assists . The only other Pelican to score in double figures was E'Twaun Moore , who scored 21 points , in 39 minutes off of the bench , while adding nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 36 - 15 in the first quarter and 36 - 19 in the second quarter . The Jazz were n't able to keep up with the Warriors in the fourth quarter , as they were out - scored 27 - 20 , giving the Warriors their fourth straight win . Kevin Durant and Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors , scoring 22 and 25 points , respectively . Durant added five rebounds and one assist in 25 minutes , while Curry added four assists and three steals in 30 minutes . Klay Thompson chipped in 17 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , while Draymond Green added 15 points and 11 rebounds in 31 minutes . Golden State shot 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , while holding the Jazz to 36 percent shooting and 30 percent from three - point range . Rudy Gobert led the Jazz in scoring with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 17 rebounds and two blocked shots , while also adding one assist and two blocks . The only other player to score in double digits for the Jazz was Derrick Favors , who finished with 14 points on 5 - of 9 shooting , in 22 minutes off the bench . Dante Exum was the only other Jazz player in double figures , as he finished with six points ( 2 - 2 FG ) and one rebound , in 26 minutes . Up next , the Warriors will travel to San Antonio on Friday to take on the Spurs , while the Jazz will head home to play the Clippers on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 128 - 119 on Wednesday at Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 27 - 13 in the first quarter and never looking back after that . They were led by Mike Conley , who finished with 27 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 12 assists and four rebounds , in 41 minutes . Marc Gasol followed up with 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG ) , five rebounds and three assists , while Zach Randolph chipped in 27 points of his own , in 35 minutes off the bench . Tony Allen finished with 11 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds , along with six steals , in 48 minutes . Zach Randolph added 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG ) and five assists , in 21 minutes . The Warriors were led in scoring by Stephen Curry , who went 15 - for - 27 from the field , including 5 - 13 from three - point range , to score 40 points , while also adding six assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block , in 42 minutes . Kevin Durant added 27 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and three blocks , in 43 minutes . Draymond Green finished with a double - double of 11 points and eight rebounds , while Klay Thompson added 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3PT ) , six rebounds and two assists . Zaza Pachulia finished with 10 points ( 3 - 4 FG , in 30 minutes , while Shaun Livingston added seven points , two assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 16 minutes . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Warriors will stay home and play the Clippers on Friday . This marks the second game in a row the Warriors have lost by at least 10 points , as they 've now lost four of their last five games .
